Job Description:
** Objective
The Head of Sales is responsible for defining the sales strategy, tailor contracts with wholesalers and retail sellers to distribute the product.
He / She manages the sales operations, designs plan to meet targets set by the BOD and the Managing Director.
He / She develops relationships with clients and evaluates costs for selling products and services in regard to the competition.

** Main Duties & Responsibility
● Create and develop the network of distribution of the product aligned with the CEO& targets.
● Determine when the product is distributed, where it is sent and what volume is to be distributed.
● Supervise the logistics and supply chain, from the plant to point of sale, including packaging, inventory, warehousing, and logistics.
● Work closely with the Supply Chain & Warehouse Manager to ensure that operations are taking place according to the schedule decided by the BOD and the Managing Director.
● Forecast the network of distribution and implement the number of selling points.
● Contract with all retailers in an area, to supermarkets, to wholesalers, to institutions and to catering trade. Implement the database of clients on a regular basis.
● Responsible for monthly/ quarterly/ yearly planning of outlets coverage, distribution network and merchandising.
● Evaluates costs for selling products and services in regards to the competition.
● Set and implement the Sales Budget in agreement with the Managing Director.
● Accountable for sales targets and other KPIs to be achieved daily, weekly, monthly and quarterly in the assigned area.
● Follow up to ensure sales policies, programs, distributor’s investments are applied and implemented properly.
● Accountable for the success of its achievement of sales and volume objectives.
● Monitor all sales, orders, product performance, and retailer feedback to further improve the distribution chain.
● Work closely with department managers to ensure that production schedules, quality control and shipping are aligned with its department’s goals.
● Hire, manage and coach sales staff with regular training.
● Maintain a well-trained and motivated staff through excellent leadership and communication skills.
● Attend corporate training and meetings.
● Ensure performance appraisal, training and professional development activities.
● Reward performance, prevent issues and resolve problems.
● Implement company policies.
Job Requirement:
● Bachelor degree in Business Administration and/or Sales & Marketing and/or Merchandising
● Minimum years’ experience managing people & projects in a similar manufacturing environment and FMCG (Fast Moving Consumer Goods).
● Proficient in Microsoft Office, Word, Excel, Outlook
● High skills in Project management and Sales management.
● Self-motivated with a positive and professional approach to management.
● High skills of leadership and communication.
● Problem solvers, able to keep calm.
● Ability to work under pressure.

** Salary & other Benefit
- Salary: Negotiation
- Working hour: Mon-Sat (Half)
- Day Off: Sunday
- Public Holiday & Annual Leave is Complied with labor law
- Seniority Pay & Annual Bonus
- Training & Development
- Insurance

Job Description:
** Objective
The Sales Representative is responsible for scheduling visits to outlets. hE/SHE initializes and manages relationships with customers, takes sales orders, sells in SKUs assortment. He/ she conducts merchandising activities and executes trade programs and activities to achieve the monthly targets and KPIs in the assigned territory.

** Main Responsibility
● Present, promote and sell products/services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers
● Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/
potential customers to meet their needs
● Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
● Reach out to customer leads through cold calling
● Expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction
● Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
● Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments
● Analyze the territory/market’s potential, track sales and status reports
● Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services.
● Continuously improve through feedback
● Make daily schedule visit to outlets as assigned territory and PJP plan;
● Execute the detailed merchandising, apply standard display, planogram and visibility of product in premises and on shelves.
● Expand the coverage outlet and ensure the customer carry our products for all SKUs;
● Keep the customer well informed to all launching promotion and ensure the effectiveness within the in-charge channel;
● Attend meetings, submit reports whenever requested.
● Any other duties relevant to the needs of the organization and as directed.
Job Requirement: ● Minimum Diploma / High School Education, preferably University degree in Sales or Marketing● Proven work experience as a Sales Representative● Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales● Converse well in Khmer● Ability to converse in English will be an advantage● Good knowledge of MS Office● Excellent communication and negotiation skills● Ability to grasp retailers needs and customer engagement● Understanding of basic sales and distribution metric● Relationship building skills and providing feedbackREMUNERATION AND BENEFITS:●	Competitive Salary Package●	Annual Bonus●	Incentive●	Insurance Packages●	Career Development, Progression and Advancement●	Healthy Working Environment and Culture●	Working hour: 5.5 Days / Per Week●	Terms and Conditions are fully compliance with Labor Laws and applicable regulations.** Interested Candidates, Please sent your CV & Current Photo and expected salary to Email: recruitment@dpnvgroup.com- Phone Number: 010 456 719 / 023 99 1234- Address: Lum Street, Toul Roka III Village, Sangat Chak Angre Krom, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh.

Job Description:
** Objective
Ensuring the reliability and availability of all production and utilities equipment having a long term focus and providing input to planning and execution of production/
maintenance plans, keeping health and safety as a priority.
Leads continuous improvement using KPI- and improvement tools (5S, Kaizen, RCFA).

** Job Responsibility
- Lead the Production/Engineering Mechanical & Electrical Technicians and Facilities Team (Welder & Fitter);
- To assist Production and Engineering Manager and co-ordinate/plans resources on the Production Lines to ensure that packaged product is produced to meet a set of targets in relation to quality, productivity, and cost Supports Production & Engineering manager (PEM) in planning day-to-day production, initiating and driving the basic
maintenance processes, restoring assets to basic condition (fit for operation at all times)
- Ensures safe working in production and maintenance (is accountable).
- Leads Safety diagnostics based in safety reports and inspections.
- Ensures production/maintenance delivers on time in full (OTIF) and packaged product is produced to meet a set of targets in relation to quality, productivity, and cost
- Leads and performs Instruments Inspection/Calibration process.
- Plans staffing and resources to the appropriate production and maintenance activities and monitors the execution and progress of the production planning, including productivity, priority setting and daily adjustments/instructions
- Informs production & engineering manager of major breakdowns.
- Conducts RCFA or BDA analysis of major breakdown and establish PDCA to close the loop.
- Develops training materials, operation SOP and provides training to all technical staff.
- Manages and organizes asset master data, (preferably) within the CMMS. Sets up the asset breakdown structure down to required maintainable item level, defines all Planned Maintenance tasks and inventory items in CMMS according to the master data standards. Implements management system.
- Monitors asset performance (OEE or line availability). Responsible for plant availability (uptime).
- Introduces basic maintenance plans on all equipment on statutory, OEM or Global Maintenance Standards.
- Sets up basic spare part segmentation and defines critical spares.
- Collects and manages asset drawings, documents, permits (licenses), warranties.
- Keep accurate documentation.
- Attend meetings, submit reports whenever requested.
- Any other duties relevant to the needs of the organization and as directed.
Job Requirement:
- Minimum Bachelor degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering and/or similar.
- 2 - 5 years Production or Maintenance experience and
managing of people preferably in food and beverages
- Proven track record in people management (getting things done within a group/team).
- Minimum of 2 years experience & knowledge of maintenance (engineering) and/or production operations and ability to setup and drive (strategic) improvement initiatives and manage changes from the shop floor within the department.
- General knowledge of maintenance engineering processes; i.e. have basic knowledge of cost driver and performance killer analysis, Equipment criticality ranking, preventive maintenance, critical spare parts selection, item segmentation & inventory management, asset performance management.
- Good knowledge of maintenance operations and CMMS (i.e. asset master data key-user and becoming/training for asset master data expert).
- Excellent technical maintenance analysis, production planning and reporting skills.
- People management and leadership.
- Ability to organize and provide training to the technical teams i.e., new recruits.

** Salary & other Benefit
- Salary: Negotiation
- Working hour: Mon-Sat (Half)
- Day Off: Sunday
- Public Holiday & Annual Leave is Complied with labor law
- Seniority Pay & Annual Bonus
- Training & Development
- Insurance

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

● Any other duties relevant to the needs of the organization and as directed

● Teamwork spirit, open minded and willing to learn and shre

Job Description:
The IT manager is responsible for maintaining the information system and computer networks.
He/she ensures that all systems are functional and secured. The IT manager manages and
supervises the activities and operations of the information Technology unit including hardware,
software, network, telephone, and computer systems administration. He/she identifies and
recommends cost-effective technology solutions for all aspects of the organization.

** Main Duties & Responsibility
* IT Infrastructure:
● Ensure all network connections are functioning well, this includes servers to be working properly.
● Maintain and administer the company server, Facebook, website, and other web programs.
● Manage and ensure effectiveness of servers, including e-mail, print, and backup servers, and their associated operating systems and software.
● Design and implement short- and long-term strategic plan.
● Conduct research, evaluate, and recommend server technology for future implementation.

* IT Support:
● Support all departments on all related IT issues including supply the computers and all related materials for new staff, fixing problems as requested by staff on both hardware and software.
● Ensure that appropriate action is taken to anticipate, investigate and resolve problems in systems and services ensuring that such problems are fully documented within relevant systems.
● Develop, implement, and maintain IT policies, procedures, and provide associated trainings for new employees including the functional operations of the company’s systems.
● Manage and control all IT assets in the company.

* IT Security:
● Be responsible in policy with the setting up passwords, virus protection and backed-up process of the company's data.
● Planning maintenance tasks such as checking for viruses, backing up data, upgrading software, and other basic maintenance to IT executive.
● Identify the security risks involved and resolve them and perform assessment of security risks and provide for solutions. 
● Document all the security policies and promote activities and procedures to create a general awareness about the significance of security within an organization.
● Send the security warnings to all staff every time that the viruses or other IT risks are detected.
● Liaise with other department regarding the uses of information system and to monitor its compliance.
● Attend meetings, submit reports, keep accurate documentation, and analyze data to improve the efficiency of the IT System.
● Any other duties relevant to the needs of the organization and as directed.
Job Requirement:
● Bachelor’s degree in IT Administration and Networking or other degree in any relevant field
● At least 3 years experiences in managerial level in IT field
● Demonstrate principles of complex network systems security measures, tools, policies, and practices
● Expertise in server and database management

Job Description: .** Main Duties & Responsibility1. Supply Chain Budget and Operation- Budget, oversees and manages supply chain budgets and costs according to annual allocation to ensure efficient allocation of resources- Assigns and allocates dedicated resources to monitor and resolve supply chain inefficiencies to meet contractual terms and conditions- Recommends and leads supply chain initiatives/programs to optimize supply chain performance- Leads and directs supply chain reporting and analyses to facilitate management decision-making- Builds and maintains strong business relationships with key business partners2. Production and Engineering- Support and lead company products sales, growth and continuous cost & quality improvements in the business- Lead of liaision with machinery suppliers, maintain collaboration for further development such as maintenance, update and staff training.- Define the plant production schedule with clear production goals- Lead and manage for plant production goals, including putting in place and implementing systems and procedures to ensure operations of the plant meets production plans scheduled with approval of Managing Director.- Ensure that the entire production chain is compliant, including bottle preforming, bottling, corking, cartoning.3. Warehouse and Logistic- Leads and directs inventory management system to ensure order fulfillment to customers with the freshest stock possible - Manage inventory and establishes controls to ensure the firm is operating at the highest level of performance based on key performance metrics and minimized supply chain risk.- Oversee the reception, the warehousing, the distribution and the maintenance operations- Manage the track of quality, quantity, stock levels, delivery times, transport costs and efficiency4. Procurement- Establishes procurement guidelines and policies on inventory holding against order fulfillment- Design and implement various purchasing strategies and procurement policies and assist to reduce supply chain cost and to optimize supplier performances- Source the best products and suppliers in terms of best value, delivery schedules and quality- Lead the negotiate and submit contracts, monitoring the quality of service provided- Build and maintain good relationships with new and existing suppliers- Forecast price trends and their impact on future activities5. Health and Safety- Lead to ensure that all aspects of the operation are in compliance with H&S Policies and SOPs- Responsible for health/safety/environment and standards.- Monitor the working conditions to ensure the continued provision of a safe and healthy working environment for the staff members and plant as well as safe end-products for consumers- Maintain standards of health and safety, hygiene and security at all times. Train the staff accordingly6. Quality Control- Monitor the quality related activies to ensure we are in compliance with HACCP and Standard Hygiene Procedures following Cambodian laws and standards set by the Company.- Implement systems and procedures to ensure manufacturing operations of the factory meets production plans, product quality and cost standards- Ensure quality orientation and identify quality improvement programmed to improve the cost effectiveness of the manufacturing process for the factory.7. Demand and Supply Planning- Develops strategic/tactical supply chain management initiatives to support the market in terms of demanding and supplying- Develop and continuously improve demand and supply planning- Ensure of development forecast models based on industry trends and demand patterns to come out the supply planning- Lead and direct for solutions to improve demand forecast accuracy and to better anticipate market needs- Monitor important changes in sales forecasts, budgets and business strategies. Any other duties that may be assigned by Managing Director or BOD from time to time.
Job Requirement:

● 5 to 6 years experience managing people/projects in the same or similar field or manufacturing environment.
● Proficient in Microsoft Office, Word, Excel, Outlook, ERP
● Must have skills in Project management and Productivity
management
● Must show Leadership abilities, Organizational skills and Multitasks
● Problem solver
● Ability to work under pressure. Self- motivated with a positive and professional approach to management.

job title: Assistant Store Manager (ASICS - Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall))
position: Assistant Store Manager (ASICS - Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall))
Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall (Phnom Penh) N/A

Job Description: • Support superior in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources• Support the implementation of accounting processes and strong internal controls to ensure governance over accounting and reporting activities• Supervise and coordinate the timely and accurate recording of general ledger entries, including month-end and year-end closing activities in accordance with local/international accounting standards• Support the preparation of accounts analyses and reconciliations to ensure variances and reconciling items are identified and resolved in a timely manner• Support the preparation of financial budgets/forecasts. Document and investigate monthly and yearly budget-to-actual variances to ensure these are accounted for• Support the preparation of financial reports (profit and loss, balance sheet, cash flow statements, etc.) for presentation to senior management. Prepare supporting analyses to the financial reports• Coordinate and execute the continuous improvement initiatives to enhance the timeliness, accuracy and quality of general ledger accounting and financial reporting• Work closely with the relevant internal stakeholders to ensure efficient month-end and year-end closing activities• Provide support and information to external auditors to facilitate the auditing process and statutory financial reporting
Job Requirement: -Demonstrate basic knowledge and understanding of the business and industry.-Demonstrate a basic knowledge in managing accounts payable and application of local/international accounting standards, principles and practices.-Demonstrate strong attention to detail and basic analytical skills.-Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint).-At least 2 years experience in finance (understanding cash collecting, cash flow) and/or related field.-Diploma or basic certification in Accounting/Finance or a related discipline (preferred)
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description:
** Job Description
• Nurse certificate or relevant work experience
• Treating patients in good manners
• Helping doctors diagnose patients and providing advice and follow-up care

• Taking care of paperwork and writing records

• Proper use medical equipment and responsibility for all of them
• Clean and organize medical equipment after used it and put back the same place

• Perform other tasks assigned by manager
Job Requirement:
• Possesses good communication skills
• Fluently Khmer language is mandatory. If know English is better.
• Must have relevant Nursing certificate and/or other related training certificate
• Must have working experience (at least 1 year) at hospital/clinic/factory infirmary room
• Must have knowledge on first aid practices
• Fresh graduate recommends to apply
• Working with Japanese boss.
• Can support office work if required

Working Days and Hours

Monday to Saturday: 7:30am to 11:30am & 12:30am to 4:30pm(Total 8hours)
Lunch time: 11:30am to 12:30am

** Salary and Benefit
- Skill Allowance
- Transportation/House
- Food fee
- National Security Fund
- Annual Salary based on performance end year review

Job Description:
-Planning lessons and activities that facilitate students' acquisition of basic and advanced computer skills.

-Prior experience as a computer teacher.
-First aid training is advantageous.
-Excellent presentation abilities.
-Strong written and administrative skills.
-Nurturing, adaptable approach to instructing.
-Passionate about fostering computer literacy and academic excellence.

Job Description:
About this job:

This position is working on managing events such as contacting clients, agencies, designers, influencers, arranging schedules, organizing events, venues, manpower, decoration, and proposing ideas for the events to the management team. Furthermore, you are required to understand how to manage budget plan for cost effectiveness and have good relationships with others. You will be working in Advertising and Event Planning Section, within Marketing and Business Planning Department. You will report your tasks to direct Manager, and General Manager.

Duties and Responsibilities:
•	Managing advertising & events for the Malls 
•	Finding new clients and creating new schemes for generating more income and increase sales
•	Maintaining existing clients, increasing more new clients with effectively communicating and solving problem relate to the events.
Job Requirement:
•	Have experiences relate to event and organizing.
•	Have a bachelor degree in marketing, public relations, or related field.
•	Good at using English for business level.
•	Be a team player and have good behavior. 
•	Be able to propose creative events or attractive activities inside the mall.
•	Support organizing event and support team members.
•	Be able to work with shift schedule. (Including weekend and holiday shift).

Job Description:
•	To conduct legal analysis and research on various legal matters and risk management related to company business.
•	To provide advice on different legal issues and assist in drafting legal opinions, memoranda and other briefing documents.
•	To provide support to all related department on the legal field.
•	To prepare, draft and review the contract relate to the construction, leasing, supplier contract, employment to ensure the company’s full legal rights.
•	To work closely with related Ministries or local regulatory bodies for registration and compliance in accordance with the Cambodian laws.
•	To draft business operation guideline and internal rule to all related department.
•	To follow-up and keep on progressing to the update of laws and regulations regarding business operation.
Job Requirement:
• Experience Required
At least 2 years of experience in a comparable position in another industry.
• Minimum Educational Level Required
Bachelor’s Degree in Law or relevant fields
• Languages Required
Good in Khmer and English both verbal and written
• Other Requirements
•	Knowledge of law standard in Cambodia practice is desirable
•	Good in computer Microsoft application
•	Ability to perform under pressure and positive attitude
•	Good Health condition & teamwork
•	Willing to learn new things
•	Creative perception and honestly
•	Other duties will be assigned by Management.

• Contact person: Ms. Chariya
• Email: cmk@cbcons.com.vn   CC: doc@cbcons,com.vn, doc@bmbsteel.com.vn, linleanghou@gmail.com
• Add: #E12, Emeral Street, Sangkat Tumnup Teok, Khan Chomka Morn, Phnom Penh
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Chariya  023 213 442 / 092 30 34 10 cmk@cbcons.com.vn #E12, Emeral Street, Sangkat Tumnup Teok, Khan Chomka Morn, Phnom Penh 023 213 442 / 092 30 34 10

Job Description: * Job Summary:The IT Program Coordinator (IPC) will provide advising and administrative support to the IT programs. The IPC will build effective relationships with AUPP faculty, staff, administrators, students, and alumni in relevant areas. Assisting the Dean with advising and registration of IT students as well as the degree audit for all IT students.* Job Responsibilities:- Maintain accurate master record of students’ progression by cohorts for all IT students.- Create and maintain a template to update progression for all IT students.- To assist the Dean with the maintenance of information on the advising on Student Information System (SIS) for IT students.- To aid the Dean with advising, registration and approval of single and dual degree students. - Work closely with the Dean to update and review students’ audit to match the curriculum for both single and dual degree.- Monitor non-compliant students for further action and counselling by the Dean, Vice President and Associate Vice President of Academic and Student Affairs as needed.- Assign/re-assign advisors as per students’ academic year and progression.- Collaborate with the Dean with forecasting of courses as per IT study plan on a semester basis through SIS audit for submission to Academic Affairs office. - Assist the Dean with academic advisors training as needed along with participation with recruitment activities. - Ensure college compliance with all accreditations, regulatory agencies, and dual degree partner university. - Provide support to students by encouraging them to use all - facilities provided by the university, i.e., Learning center, library, Fort Hays State University (FHSU) office, etc. - Work closely with the Dean and FHSU Manager to keep record of students who failed dual and single degree courses and advise students who may need to repeat courses later.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field.- Excellent attention to detail, organizational, written, verbal, and presentation skills are needed.- Experience with technology and analytics in a student information system.- Ability to work successfully with diverse populations and understand the unique challenges faced by diverse populations.- Ability to work a flexible schedule, as needed; this may include occasional work on evenings or weekends.* How To ApplyFor Online Application: Please go to our website and click on the role you are interested and fill in the online application there Career Opportunities – AUPP – American University of Phnom Penh- Email your cover letter and curriculum vitae to careers@aupp.edu.kh- Chat to Recruitment team via t.me/tphauppcareer (069 99 00 23)We would appreciate it if you could use the designation: “[IT Program Coordinator] – Applicant Full Name” in the subject line.* Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interviews. Inquiries can be directed to the email provided.
Company Profile: American University of Phnom Penh (AUPP) is an independent, private, English language higher education institution, based on the American model of liberal arts education, grounded in the culture of Cambodia and fostering an environment that embraces cultural diversity.  The University offers high quality undergraduate and graduate liberal arts and professional education.  The University educates students in an environment of academic excellence, preparing them to be outstanding ethical leaders who will make significant contributions to Cambodia, the ASEAN region and the world.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Finance Manager 069 99 00 23 careers@aupp.edu.kh No. 50, St. 315 Boeung Kok II, Toul Kork Phnom Penh, Cambodia 069 99 00 23

Job Description: -Support manager in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources-Implement action plans (e.g. make regular calls/visits, take orders, etc.) to achieve sales targets for assigned businesses/territories-Track self/team progress against key performance indicators and sales plans. Prioritize and review daily sales activities performed-Execute sales activities for assigned businesses/territories, including product portfolios and marketing plan introductions, order taking, marketing display set-ups and in-store merchandising-Prepare quotation/tender prices, delivery and commercial terms, in accordance with company policies-Report on the activities and products of the competitors via inputs to the competition reports-Record sales data for reporting and tracking purposes. Maintain relevant customer data in appropriate customer relationship management databases
Job Requirement: -Demonstrate basic knowledge and understanding of the industry/market/competitors/customers-Demonstrate basic knowledge in assigned territories/products/services and strong selling skills-Demonstrate strong communication and negotiation skills-Demonstrate basic research and analytical skills-Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)-Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken-Soft skills: Good communication, Honesty-Diploma or professional qualification in Business Studies/Marketing/Economics or a related discipline-Work experience: Up to two years' experience in a similar role
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
Contact Info: Contact Information DKSH Cambodia Administration Manager 087800338 jobs.kh@dksh.com No. 797, Corner Preah Monivong Boulevard and Street 484, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 087800338

Job Description: The Retention Initiatives Coordinator (RIC) is responsible for initiating, coordinating, and evaluation outreach efforts for students identified as experiencing academic and non-academic difficulties. This will include identifying and assigning appropriate interventions for early alerts, facilitating campus-wise student success workshops, and working closely with students to balance their college-life-work responsibilities. In addition, this person will focus on special events or activities which enhance the student’s sense of belonging.* Responsibilities Are As Follows:- Research retention-related trends in higher education worldwide.- Evaluate alignment of current retention initiatives at AUPP with the trends worldwide and suggest areas for improvement as well as new initiatives to the Student Affairs team.- Expand and coordinate the success coaching initiative through the Student Affairs office under the supervision of the department Director.- Collaborate with appropriate departments to design, develop and implement a comprehensive student services system that includes individualized outreach, success tracking, and appropriate interventions and accommodations.- Provide ongoing training and support to faculty and staff in effective delivery of services and implementation of new support tools/technology.- Ensure regular discussions with various student groups, ensuring continuous feedback is channeled from students to AUPP leadership.- Coordinate the activities of the Committee for Student - - - Success Initiatives focusing on student mental and physical well-being, academic success, and related challenges.- Coordinate retention activities, specifically with graduating students of the AUPP High School as well as the students in the English Preparatory Program.- Maintain regular communication with the Learning Center Director, AUPP Librarian, AUPP High School Principal and English Preparatory Program Director to ensure transparency in communication between the departments.- Support the admission and marketing initiatives as needed to represent supportive services available at AUPP to prospective students. - Performs other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s degree. Master’s degree preferred.- Experience working in a higher education environment while working directly with students.- Strong command of the English language. Second language preferred.- Be able to work independently, producing expected outputs under time pressure.- Demonstrate ability to work collaboratively with a team.- Excellent organizational, technological, and communication skills- Excellent interpersonal communication skills and the ability to work well with young adults. - Experience teaching English as a Second Language preferred.- Willing to work nights and weekends as needed.* How To ApplyFor Online Application: Please go to our website and click on the role you are interested and fill in the online application there Career Opportunities – AUPP – American University of Phnom Penh.- Email your cover letter and curriculum vitae to careers@aupp.edu.kh- Chat to Recruitment team via t.me/tphauppcareer (069 990 023)We would appreciate it if you could use the designation: “[Retention Initiatives Coordinator] – Applicant Full Name” in the subject line.Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interviews. Inquiries can be directed to the email provided.

Job Description: Senior Web Developer responsible for managing front end and back-end services and the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition, and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well. * Roles And Responsibilities:- Lead the entire web application development life cycle right from concept stage to delivery and post launch support. - Ensure the security and integrity of University API endpoint, and make sure application tokens, API keys are well managed and regular changes.- Develop and administer part of Universities’ Student Information System.- Build innovative, state-of-the-art applications and collaborate with the User Experience (UX) team. - Convey effectively with all task progress, evaluations, suggestions, schedules along with technical and process issues.- Document the development process, architecture, and standard components.- Evaluating the results of the integration projects and preparing reports for management. * Communication Requirements- Internal:Maintenance of close communication among all stakeholders is a mandatory requirement of the job. It spans across 1-to-1, 1-to-many as well as many-to-many basis and could involve external and external parties.- External:Whilst the preferred mode of communication would be via emails, the other mediums such as verbal, hardcopy based, presentation based etc. would be applicable irrespective of using digital or non-digital media.
Job Requirement: * Education:Professional training, diploma or certification in system development.Undergraduate level education in IT or similar fields.* Work Experience:- At least 3 years of work experience in a similar functional environment with responsibilities.- Broad experience working with complex operational systems. - Working knowledge of modern development patterns including Agile.- Ability to prepare documentation for evaluation and recommendation for management approval.  * Technical Skills:- Experience developing systems using PHP with Laravel framework.- Experience developing Unit Test for Laravel.- In depth knowledge of object-oriented PHP and Laravel 5 PHP Framework.- Demonstrable experience with PHP including OOP, security, refactoring & design patterns. - Experience working in AGILE development environment. - Hands on experience with SQL schema design, SOLID principles, REST API design.- Experience using Linux Server (Ubuntu or Arch).* Soft Skills:- Good communications skills, both spoken and written in English and Khmer. - Should be IT Savvy with proficiency in word processing, spreadsheets, and presentations. - Good listening, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.- Possess personal traits: Initiative; self-driver, team player, detailed and meticulous. - Strong analytical skills.* How To ApplyFor Online Application: Pleas go to our website and click on the role you are interested and fill in the online application there Career Opportunities – AUPP – American University of Phnom Penh- Email your cover letter and curriculum vitae to careers@aupp.edu.kh- Chat to Recruitment team via t.me/tphauppcareer (069 990 023)We would appreciate it if you could use the designation: “[Senior Web Developer] – Applicant Full Name” in the subject line.* Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interviews. Inquiries can be directed to the email provided.

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description:
-Lead sales team to achieve sales targets (daily, monthly and yearly)
-Build distribution channel with dealers nationwide
-Develop sales and distribution strategies to disrupt market and capture market share from competitors
-Recruit, coach, train and develop new sales consultants to be equipped with highly tainted selling skills
-Build reports, and customer relationships and identify the customer's requirement and market trends
-Drive the execution of new products launch into dealers channel on time and full.
-Ensure sales opportunities are maximized within the assigned regions through the development of dealers and retailers
-Develop sales incentive scheme to maximized sales performances.
-To work with General Manager to develop dealers incentive programs to ensure the products is competitive for dealers
-Be a market expert with insightful information regarding customers preferences and competition landscape
-Maintains contact with the customers to ensure the sales processes are completed with efficiency manners
-Maintain a professional manner and high standards of personal presentation at all times
-Perform other tasks assigned by division general manager (GM)
Job Requirement:
-Teamwork
-Endurance
-Verbal and Written Communication
-Influence and Charisma
-Minimum 4 - 6 years of working experience in selling products for the Automotive After market or FMCG
-Excellent communication in both internal and external channels
-Good command of English language, other language is a plus
-Able to work independently and with a team
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description: • Provides the oversight of project implementation for all activities, outputs, and outcomes related to project management and administration which is composed of reporting, budget development and monitoring, financial transactions, execution of project plans, and meeting of project performance criteria;• Provides strategic leadership and technical, operational, financial, and managerial decision-making for successful implementation of project activities;• Ensures that the project produces the specified objectives and results in the annual goals and workplan(s) to the required standard of quality and within the prescribed timelines and budget parameters;• Recommends on changes to a project that is ongoing, or developing an alternate course of action if it appears that the project is not proceeding on schedule, meeting its budget or is otherwise producing unsatisfactory results;• Prepares, or aids in preparing memorandums with regards to project status, appointment of consultants, agents, contractors, suppliers, or vendor selections, recommendations for award of contracts, cost variations, value engineering, termination of contracts, or other such memorandums related to projects as necessary;• Ensures the permits and legal papers are secured ahead of the project commencement and completion;• Works both in an office and construction site environment, has travelling where necessary to different locations as required;• Oversees the selection and training of qualified project staff, assigning clear roles and responsibilities, set clear goals and objectives, provide effective supervision, and manage performance to ensure efficient operations.

Company Profile:
Winsun Cambodia is a proud member of the Taisun Holding Group and has secured its position as the leader of the Cambodian hygiene products market. With our most well-known diaper brands UniDry and SunMate, we have been offering a sound solution to personal health and hygiene to families across all of Cambodia.
We have over 20 years of experience in the personal hygiene industry and are constantly finding innovative technological solutions to elevate our product quality and benefits. Started as the first diaper manufacturer in Cambodia, we now offer a full scope of hygiene products including baby diapers, adult incontinence products, sanitary pads for ladies, wet wipes, and face masks.

Even though we have become the number one brand in Cambodia, we never forgot what got us here. Our core value “Growing Together” is so much more than just a saying. We sincerely believe that for our business to thrive we must also take good care of all of our stakeholders. We are an active promoter of clean energy and a regular donor to struggling communities all over Southeast Asia.
-Our Mission: To be one of the best solution providers for premium hygiene & natural products.
-Our Vision: To be the leading manufacturer of hygiene products & services in Asia through sustainable development.
General Overview of Winsun:

-120 employees at Winsun Cambodia
-More than 22 years of experience in the industry
-Export business spans across 20 countries worldwide
-Total of 8 product categories, maintaining the ratio of 70% OBM and 30% OEM.

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Job Description: • Consolidates and review monthly and annual tax submission in compliance with laws and regulations within the required time frame for the company.• Manages and coordinates tax queries and tax audits from GDT.• Manages tax planning for all companies in the Group, and provide innovative tax solution to complex tax issues.• Identify and suggest recommendations to mitigate tax risks.• Maintains enough tax provision on general ledger and prepares tax-related data requests.• Improves processes by developing or implementing best practices to ensure efficiency and compliance.• Fully responsible for systematic documentation and record-keeping of all relevant and sensitive documents.• Manages annual corporate updates from MOC, MEF, and GDT.  • Facilitates administrative work with GDT for any related tax matters.• Advises management on the impact of new laws on tax issues• Coaches and trains tax accountants for tax preparation.• Assists in the development of in-house tax training programs• Adheres to tax professional standards and ethics in tax functions• Builds and maintains a strong working relationship with auditors, tax officers, and relevant compliance officers/bodies.• Supports management with special projects and workflow process improvements and internal control assessment • Builds close working relationships with other business functions to provide technical advice on Tax issues• Helps management with company-wide strategic planning• Performs other duties assigned by the management of the Company.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s Degree in accounting or relevant field• Knowledge in Cambodia Tax Law• Good at Microsoft Office, internet, and email• Good at Khmer and English language in both writing and typing.• Good at communication skills• At least 4 years experience in Accounting & Tax.

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
-   Lead, coach and develop Call Centre Supervisors and Managers as well as 3rd Party service providers to make sure customer experience is maintained at a high standard.

Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Job Description:
** Reporting Line: Manager, Treasury & Reporting

** Key Responsibilities:
- Perform reconciliation on daily sales between Cash Collection Report & Shop Sales Report to ensure accuracy of sales reporting & timely complete the accounting entries
- Coordinate with Business Units to update price listing in SAP system to ensure the accuracy of invoice issued to customers.
- Handle the process of issuing the invoices to customers with timeliness, accuracy and completeness.
- Post incoming payments from customers (either by cheque or bank transfer), clear customer accounts and follow up with Business Units on long outstanding receivables.
- Verify vendor's invoices posting, raise payment proposal and perform clearing vendor accounts
- Perform monthly bank reconciliation.
- Take part in quarterly stock take with Shop team
- Perform timely investigation of suspense/miscellaneous balances
- Ensure full compliance to the company's procedures and guidelines
- Any other ad-hoc projects assigned
Job Requirement:
- Education: Senior / Fresh Graduate student in Accounting Finance or Banking
- Skills: Understanding of mathematics and the accounting flows is a plus
- Language: Good command of Khmer/English writing and speaking.
- Period of intern: 6 months up to 1 year with monthly allowance provided

Applications should be submitted via sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com or to our Head Office, ANINA Building 6th Floor, No 240, St. 271, B.P600, 12351 Phnom Penh, Cambodia Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.
Company Profile:
TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. (previously called TOTAL Cambodge) is an affiliate of TotalEnergies, a broad energy company that produces and markets energies on a global scale: oil and biofuels, natural gas and green gases, renewables and electricity. Our 105,000 employees are committed to energy that is ever more affordable, clean, reliable and accessible to as many people as possible. Active in more than 130 countries, TotalEnergies puts sustainable development in all its dimensions at the heart of its projects and operations to contribute to the well-being of people. 

TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been officially operating in Cambodia since 1993. Throughout the country, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been involved in marketing various energy and lubricants products and services to its customers in both the private and public sectors. We offer a wide range of products through more than 100 service stations with over 52 Bonjour Shops, Industrial fuels, Aviation fuels and lubricants. Through the TotalEnergies Card, customers are offered a convenient way to make and manage fuel purchases. Other services offered include used oil analysis, tank installations and bulk deliveries to many of our Commercial customers.

In view of supporting its growth in Cambodia, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.  is looking for a talented and motivated candidate for the position as follow:


Applications should be submitted via email: sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com *Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms Lypy LY   sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com ANINA Building 6th Floor, No 240, St 271, B.P 600,  Postal Code- 120606, Phnom Penh– CAMBODIA

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Willing to work overtime and may be required to work in shifts.

Job Description: JOB TITLE:	ROOM ATTENDANT/ អ្នករៀបចំបន្ទប់REPORTS TO: 	CLEANING SUPERVISOR/ ប្រធានផ្នែកសំអាតLOCATION:	PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: 	NEGOTIABLE1.  សម្អាតបន្ទប់ភ្ញៀវដែលបានចាត់តាំង និងកន្លែងផ្សេងទៀតនៃអគារដូចជា ជណ្ដើរយន្ត និងបន្ទប់     រង់ចាំ ។2.  ប្ដូរក្រណាត់ ឬកន្សែងប្រឡាក់ និងបន្ថែមរបស់ប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងអោយភ្ញៀវនៅពេលចាំបាច់ ។3.  រៀបចំ Turndown Service នៅពេលមានការស្នើរសុំពីភ្ញៀវ ។4.  ប្រមូលរបស់របរដែលបាត់ និងរកឃើញហើយជូនដំណឹងដល់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកសំអាតដើម្បីប្រគល់ជូន     ភ្ញៀវវិញឲ្យទាន់ ពេលវេលា ។5.  វាយតម្លៃ និងឆ្លើយចំពោះសំណួរ និងការសាកសួរភ្ញៀវនិងអតិថិជននៅពេលចាំបាច់ ។6.  ធានាបាននៅការពេញចិត្តអតិបរិមារបស់ភ្ញៀវ VIP ដោយឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងសំណួររបស់ពួកគេឲ្យបាន     ទាន់ពេលវេលា និងប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព ។7.  ជួយក្រុមបោកគក់ដោយប្រគល់ខោអាវរបស់ភ្ញៀវអោយទៅកាន់ក្រុមបោកគក់ និងប្រគល់ឲ្យពួកគេ     វិញបន្ទាប់ពីពួក គេបានបោកសំអាតរួច ។8.  គោរពតាមការអនុវត្ត និងគោលនយោបាយរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនឲ្យបានល្អបំផុត ក៏ដូចជាអនុវត្តតាម     អនាម័យ ឬស្តង់ដារ សុវត្ថិភាពដែលអាចអនុវត្តបាន ។9.  អនុវត្តការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមតម្រូវការ ឬការចាត់ចែងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែក ។
Job Requirement: 1. រៀនចប់មធ្យមសិក្សា2. មានបទពិសោធន៏ផ្នែកទទួលភ្ញៀវ និង / ឬ បទពិសោធន៏ផ្នែកសំអាត3. ចេះសរសេរ និងអានភាសារខ្មែរ, អាចនិយាយភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន កាន់តែប្រសើរ4. មានបទពិសោធន៏ក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៏ និងផលិតផលសម្អាត5. អាចបទបែននៃម៉ោងធ្វើការរួមទាំងចុងសប្ដាហ៏និងថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកផ្សេងៗ
Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Our quality construction and building materials have been used in many real estate and property projects in Cambodia, including hotels. Office and retails buildings, condominium, shopping centers, and boreys.

At Y Chhe, we are a people-orientated company; our business is not only providing the best for our customers but also our employees. We strive to be the benchmark for business standards in Cambodia, and spearhead the introduction of innovation and sustainability in our market.

Carry out the sales plan activities and coordination among the team.2.  Customer retention through appropriate sale methods to optimize quality of     service. 3.  Execute sales tools with marketing team to expand construction product line.4.  Build up relationship with key customers as well as frequent visit     wholesalers.5. Good command of written and spoken in English, Chinese is advantage.8.  Excellent customer service and problems solving.9.  Strong communication and interpersonal skills.10. Be honest, reliable, and self-motivated.

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    PROJECT CONSTRUCTION SUPERVISORREPORTS TO:   PROJECT CONSTRUCTION MANAGERLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1.  Communicate and work closely with contractors and internal teams in site     safety, construction schedules, Work place safety, environmental and waste     management.2.  Coordinate the overall negotiation process, including negotiation and     closing of deals with contractors.3.  Monitor machine and equipment installation and ensure specifications of the     equipment comply with quality standards and agreement.4.  Monitor delivery status of equipment and ensure installation is within     timeline, budget and project schedule.5.  Work closely with construction team and related departments on the placement     of equipment, supply storage, etc. 6.  Manage the overall performance of the project team and provide training and     development on work and safety Procedures / guidelines.7.  Assist in the development, review, and update of site safety and health     analysis and ensure that all safety, environmental and quality policies and     practices are understood and complied by contractors. 8.  Supervise site engineers to ensure efficient and smooth construction     operation, including construction scheduling, coordination and throughput     monitoring.9.  Provide reliability input into maintenance procedures, standards and     specifications.10. Participate in technical investigations, studies, problem review, new and     proposed equipment, materials, processes and facilities and provide sound     engineering evaluations and recommendations for proposed actions.11. Perform other related duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: 1.  Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, MEP engineering or a related field.     Master’s degree is preferred.2.  Minimum 5 years of experience in construction project.3.  In-depth knowledge and understanding of construction materials, structural     projects, etc. 4.  Knowledge of construction methods and strategies.5.  Knowledge of project management and risk management.6.  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to     communicate professionally with contractors, customers, managers and     employees at all level.7.  Ability to identify risks and mitigate forthcoming conflicts or unacceptable     business outcomes.8.  Ability to think creatively, innovatively and strategically.9.  Strong analytical, planning and organizing skills.

Job Description: JOB TITLE:	SENIOR ARCHITECTREPORTS TO: 	DESIGN MANAGERLOCATION:	PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE:   NEGOTIABLE1.  Reviewing and designing architectural and engineering plans.2.  Ensuring all plans are compliant with governmental health and safety     regulations.3.  Researching knowledge of various engineering disciplines, application     methods, and materials.4.  Monitoring the work of Architects team and making recommendations.5.  Providing guidance to subcontractors like builders, plumbers, and     electricians, and helping them interpret design specifications.6.  Liaising with clients to ensure all issues are addressed in a timely manner.7.  Ensuring the team works together to achieve set goals and targets.8.  Acting as a mentor to new Architects and helping them fine-tune their design     skills and improve their industry knowledge.9.  Networking and consulting with various industry professionals.10. Others tasks assigned by Design Manager.

A good portfolio and 5 years of work experience as an Architect.4. Willingness to work overtime as required.5. Excellent leadership and communication skills.6. Brilliant interpersonal and networking skills.7. Detail-oriented and highly analytical.8. In-depth understanding of CAD and AutoCAD software.9. Deadline-driven and dedicated to excellence.

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    CONTENT CREATORREPORTS TO:   MARKTING MANAGERLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1. Excellent portfolio of work.

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    PROPERTY MANAGERREPORTS TO:   MANAGING DIRECTORLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1. Collecting rent and other property fees from tenants and individual owners.2. Reporting the property’s financial status, occupancy and expiring leases to    property owners.3. Meeting potential tenants, showing them the property and assessing their    applications.4. Inspecting properties and arranging for repairs and new materials as    required.5. Arranging contracts for maintenance, trash removal, landscaping, security and    other ongoing services and managing disputes with these service providers    where appropriate.6. Investigating and resolving property complaints and rental violations.7. Attracting new tenants through advertising, property viewings, and    encouraging referrals.8. Interviewing tenants and running credit checks.9. Preparing and managing budgets negotiating and enforcing lease agreements.10. Addressing tenant complaints and inspecting vacated units.11. Contracting and supervising repairs and maintenance work.12. Collecting rent, dealing with late payments, and handling operating     expenses.13. Maintaining records of income, expenses, signed leases, complaints,     maintenance, etc.14. Preparing reports on the financial performance of properties.15. Terminating leases and initiating eviction proceedings.16. Others task assigned by Managing Director.
Job Requirement: 1. Bachelor Degree in business administration, property management or           real-estate preferred.2. At least 5 years of experience as a property manager or facility management.3. Customer service and interpersonal skills needed to meet with prospective and    current tenants.4. Job Description: JOB TITLE:    BUILDING MANAGERREPORT TO:    PROPERTY MANAGERLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1. Responsible for everyday operations, management, and overall performance of    Front Desk, Housekeeping.2. Supervise, coach and ensure smooth daily operation of the Service Desk    operation.3. Build a rapport with residents and to provide personalized service whenever    possible.4. Coordinate with all departments to ensure residents’ request and complains    are promptly followed up.5. Responsible for handover move-in process and move out process of and early    termination of rental.6. Track resident satisfaction levels and ensure feedback is communicated to    relevant departments7. Coordinating and overseeing regular building maintenance and repairs.8. Managing and directing cleaning and security staff and activities.9. Preparing and carrying out emergency protocols and procedures.10. Maintaining a safe environment for building occupants and visitors.11. Preparing and monitoring maintenance budgets.12. Negotiating and liaising with third-party service providers.13. Conducting regular building inspections and preparing reports.14. Ensuring facilities are in compliance with applicable policies, regulations,     and building codes.15. Responding to inquiries and requests by building tenants and resolving any     problems or issues.16. Perform other duties assigned by Property Manager.
Job Requirement: 1. Bachelor Degree in business, management or real estate preferred.2. At least 3-5 years of experience as a building manager or facility management3. Arrange and schedule maintenance to be carry out.4. Cordial and warm, enjoy interacting and engaging with tenants5. Knowledge of relevant laws, regulations, and building codes.6. Excellent project management and negotiation skills.7. Good communication and customer service skills.8. Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills.9. Be proactive in thinking, to be able to react fast to problems10.Be well informed of apartments’ facilities and activities and able to answer    all inquiries.11.Able to work well under stressful situations and handle challenges in a    professional manner.

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    GYM SUPERVISORREPORT TO:    BUILDING MANAGER LOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1. Manage and ensure smooth daily operation facilities swimming pools, spas, hot    tubs, and fitness.2. Diagnoses, repairs and maintains public swimming pools, water systems, filter    systems, pumps, and playground.3. Overview the proper chemical balance for the pool.4. Control the pH and chlorine values for good water quality.5. Check the pool, pumps and filters all water features using proper chemicals    and cleaners.6. Maintain the pool area including cleaning the deck and other maintenance    tasks.7. Respond to swimming pool-related work orders in a timely, friendly and    efficient manner8. Transports and stores hazardous chemicals.9. Carrying out scheduled water cleaning, using chemicals like chlorine.10. Regularly testing the swimming pool, jacuzzi, water quality, and pH balance.11. Ensure safety, cleanliness and hygiene standard are met.12. Ensure accurate data entries of daily membership and administrative reports.13. Liaise with the facilities management team to support maintenance/cleaning     schedule at the venue.14. Managing personal trainer and overseeing their collective efforts to deliver     programmed and services.15. Ensure stock and inventory is always adequate16. Assist gym user with use of equipment in a safe and correct manner.17. Handling gym membership, walk-ins and phone call appointments18. Organize and promote all fitness-related events, programs and activities.19. Perform other duties assigned by Management.20. Responsible for targeting improvements in service level delivery.21. Record and monitor daily safety checks on all equipment, report. any hazards     and ensure works are completed.
Job Requirement: 1.  Associate degree of hospitality and hotel management or general knowledge of     sport specific rules.2.  Preferably with 2-3 years experiences in Fitness Center Operation     Management.3.  ​​Possess excellent customer service.4.  Team player and ability to multi-task well under pressure.5.  Independent and self-motivated with good interpersonal and social skill.6.  Must be able to handle conflict resolution with participants.7.  Able to work on weekends and public holidays.8.  First Aid + AED Certification (Preferably).9.  Proficiency in Microsoft Office or related computer software.10. Knowledge of program specific court dimensions and equipment, ability to     execute game set up.

job title: សន្តិសុខ​​ | Security Guard
position: សន្តិសុខ​​ | Security Guard
Job Description: ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ1.ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងថែរក្សាសន្តិសុខសុវត្ថិភាពក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន2.មានការសហការគ្នារវាងក្រុមការងារបានល្អ3.ចេះអង្កេតមើលសុវត្ថិភាពនៅក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន4.ត្រូវគោរពតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង5.គោរពពេលវេលាបំពេញការងារ6.គ្រប់គ្រងនិងថែរក្សាយាន្តជំនិះ ទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និង បុគ្គលិក ក្នុងម៉ោងបំពេញការងារឲ្យបានល្អ7.កត់ត្រាអត្តសញ្ញាណរបស់អតិថិជន ឬ ភ្ញៀវដែលចេញ-ចូល8.កត់ត្រាឥវ៉ាន់ដែលផ្ញើចេញ-ចូល9.រក្សាសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុននៅមុខការិយាល័យ10.សម្រួលកន្លែងចំណតរថយន្តរបស់ភ្ញៀវ និងបុគ្គលិកឲ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ល្អ11.ស្នើសុំឲ្យភ្ញៀវដែលមានអាវុធជាប់ខ្លួន ផ្ញើអាវុធទុកនៅនឹងតុសន្តិសុខទើបអនុញ្ញាតឲ្យចូលក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន12.ត្រូវរាយការណ៍ជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ជាបន្ទាន់ អំពីសភាពការណ៍មិនប្រក្រតីទាំងឡាយ ដែលអាចមានហានិភ័យចំពោះក្រុមហ៊ុន ឬ បុគ្គលិក។
Job Requirement: លក្ខខណ្ឌតម្រូវ- ត្រូវមានអត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណសញ្ជាតិខ្មែរ - មានទីលំនៅច្បាស់លាស់- មិនធ្លាប់ ប្រើប្រាស់គ្រឿងញៀន- មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងតួនាទីយ៉ាងតិច ៦ខែ - មិនធ្លាប់មានប្រវត្តិ ប្រព្រឹត្តបទល្មើសផ្សេងៗ- មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការធ្វើការ- ត្រូវមានអាយុចាប់ពី ១៨ ឆ្នាំ ទៅ ៤០ ឆ្នាំ- ចេះអាន និងសរសេរ ភាសាខ្មែរ (រឹតតែល្អប្រសើរ)
