Job Description: JOB TITLE:    QUALITY CONTROL MANAGERREPORTS TO:   MANAGERLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1. Gaining an understanding of the client's needs and requirements and    communicating them and the quality standards to the production teams.2. Devising ways to improve the manufacturing process to ensure higher-quality    goods.3. Devising, improving, and reviewing new specifications and procedures for    products or processes, and training staff to use them.4. Setting the requirements for raw materials from suppliers and monitoring    their compliance.5. Supervising inspectors, technicians, and other staff members and providing    guidance.6. Ensuring legal obligations are followed and ensuring compliance with    regulatory bodies and with health and safety guidelines.8. Overseeing product development procedures to identify any deviations from    quality standards.9. Inspecting the final output, comparing it to the requirements, and approving    or rejecting the final products.10.Keeping accurate documentation and performing statistical analysis.11.Gaining feedback from the clients, attending meetings, submitting reports,    and assisting external auditors and inspectors.
Job Requirement: 1.  A bachelor's degree in science or business-based programs.2.  Previous experience in production or manufacturing.3.  Experience in business administration may be advantageous.4.  Strong attention to detail, observation, organisational, and leadership     skills.5.  In-depth knowledge of quality control procedures and legal standards.6.  Strong knowledge of mathematics, data analysis, and statistical methods.7.  Excellent communication and listening skills.8.  Good technical and IT skills.

Job Description: JOB TITLE: Survey EngineerREPORTS TO: Project ManagerLOCATION: Phnom PenhSALARY RANGE: Negotiable1. Land surveying by Total Station tool or D-GPS tool2. Topographic update map and calculate volume3. Work follow road cut and quarry design to relation with planning.4. Make cross section, mapping, and drawing.5. Cooperate daily on the contractor or sub-contractor’s work.6. Ensure the correct location of building or part of building.7. Provide on-going and continuous contractual advice during construction to ensure that all parties strictly adhere to the corrected works.8. Daily site inspection and survey report9. Job Description: The role serves as the liaison between the company and the corporate clients and will be responsible for maintaining and growing existing accounts.  - Review the company competitive position, hunt, and sign contracts with new key accounts.  - Actively participate to the country strategy as part of the leadership country team - Drive additional revenue and renewal opportunities through existing enterprise accounts. - Elevate the overall client experience. - Strengthen the company.  - Guide sales growth within existing business relationships and acquire new business opportunities within a defined vertical and geography  - To lead and manage the Broke Relationship Manager Execution team for the region to ensure that they have the right skills and are motivated to perform well in their roles. - Review competitive treatment programs and processes (cooling, boiler, wastewater treatment) within heavy industries to secure new business

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities:• Work with Business Analyst Manager and requester to determine appropriate UAT test coverage, test scenarios, and exploratory testing strategy based on business requirements and timeline. • Prepare time efforts estimates, key milestone, create test cases and test data document to complete the entire Testing Process• Perform functional testing, defect management on technology solutions to validate business requirements, follow User Requirement Specifications (URSs) / Functional Specification (FSDs) and the outcome of the system. • Identify functional process related details, any conflicting or gaps in the processes and report functional defects, usability variances, and business process issues that may negatively impact production readiness or agreed upon acceptance criteria• Re-testing all rectified defects and gaps or new findings until its completely satisfying the specifications• Provide test results walkthrough to respective business users with the details of the performed Test cases and the Test results with relevant evidences (Screen shots, Test data etc) for User Sign-off.• Carryout specific testing and verifications to ensure the production system performs without issues or having negative impact to the business functions after system go live.• Initiate discussion with IT management in case there is any changes in the test scope to compute the additional effort
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in business or Information Systems is preferred• 3 to 5 years functional testing experience with software development company or financial institution.• Experience in Life insurance domain is preferred• Good knowledge in systems testing and end user experience expectations• Good requirement understanding & quick learning skills• Excellent analytical and communications skills (verbal/written)• Ability to analyze situations, courses of action, and consequences, and properly communicate them to management• Hands on experience on any test management and defect management tool• Strong product knowledge and/or underwriting new business process understanding• Proficient in use of Microsoft Office programs• Thorough knowledge in testing, experience in Test case writing, Test data preparation, test execution, defect reporting and tracking.

Job Description: Perform risk analysis on loan files to ensure that the quality of loan files and the risks are identified then provide recommendation to loan approval committee for final decision. In addition, she/he find the gap between SME Credit Policy, Procedure, and Methodology and implementation then provide recommendation to related departments for improvement.Responsibilities: - Advice to analyze SME loan files for HQ loan committee to make effective loan decision;- Support and assist in strengthening credit capabilities for RHCRs, BMs and DBMs as well as OCRs; - Develop and update credit risk tool to effective identify and analyze the level of risk of loan application;- Prepare SME follow up report to make sure the accuracy and timely condition compliance required by Credit Committee (CC);- Conduct mission to branch and field to understand about real clients' biz and operation situation;- Maintain and update sector card and provide the training to the network staff on the usage of sector card as the benefit for the effectiveness of loan  application process;- Maintain and update Loan delegation (rule, criteria, guideline and system);- Provide SME assessment training and coaching to the network;- Conduct Loan purpose follow up and provide recommendation to relevant managers for the action;- Study Standard business data for loan assessment;  - Conduct monthly loan purpose survey follow up and make recommendations to CRC in case of finding out loan purpose cheating and collusion;- Conduct Monthly Control;- Other task assign by hiring manager.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor degree of Business Administration, Management, Economic, Accounting or related field;- Minimum 2 years in Sale or Credit Officer medium loan (SME);- Experience in banking or MFI industry preferable; - Good verbal and written communication both Khmer and English;- Self-motivation and team player; - Good computer literacy.
Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities:1. Drive the stakeholders for completion of documentation relating to business requirement capturing and system designing specifications with required verifications and sign-off. (URSs and SFSs)2. Provide necessary support and guidance to the Users as well as Solution Providers to transform User Requirements to Systems Functional Specs.3. Evaluate best suitable solutions for AIA with business justifications and recommendations for management approval.4. Manage solution providers through the RFP, Procurement and sourcing, legal and technology risks related documentation and timely payments to ensure successful closure of the projects (solution delivery and implementation)5. Manage the UAT process and solution implementations with timely go-live6. Work with Business Users to ensure preparation and validations of UAT plans including the Test Scripts as per the signed off URSs/ SFSs.7. Maintain close working relationship with the Business Functional Users as well as the Solution Providers to ensure smooth execution of projects until its successful closure8. Ensure carrying out people development and motivation activities sufficiently to ensure availability of right competencies for solution delivery as expected by the senior management.9. Perform other responsibilities and duties periodically assigned by the reporting authority in order to achieve the overall functional objectives of the division.

Experience in Life Insurance is an added advantage.Knowledge/Skills• Good knowledge of Business Analysis in a financial service field.• Good knowledge and practice in Software Development Lifecycle.• Good communications skills, both spoken and written in English and Khmer.• Should be IT Savvy with proficiency in word processing, spreadsheets and presentations.• Good listening, negotiation and interpersonal skills• Possess personal traits: Initiative; self-driver, team player, detailed and meticulous.

Company Profile:

Job Description:

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

Company Profile:
Winsun Cambodia is a proud member of the Taisun Holding Group and has secured its position as the leader of the Cambodian hygiene products market. With our most well-known diaper brands UniDry and SunMate, we have been offering a sound solution to personal health and hygiene to families across all of Cambodia.
We have over 20 years of experience in the personal hygiene industry and are constantly finding innovative technological solutions to elevate our product quality and benefits. Started as the first diaper manufacturer in Cambodia, we now offer a full scope of hygiene products including baby diapers, adult incontinence products, sanitary pads for ladies, wet wipes, and face masks.

Even though we have become the number one brand in Cambodia, we never forgot what got us here. Our core value “Growing Together” is so much more than just a saying. We sincerely believe that for our business to thrive we must also take good care of all of our stakeholders. We are an active promoter of clean energy and a regular donor to struggling communities all over Southeast Asia.
-Our Mission: To be one of the best solution providers for premium hygiene & natural products.
-Our Vision: To be the leading manufacturer of hygiene products & services in Asia through sustainable development.
General Overview of Winsun:

-120 employees at Winsun Cambodia
-More than 22 years of experience in the industry
-Export business spans across 20 countries worldwide
-Total of 8 product categories, maintaining the ratio of 70% OBM and 30% OEM.

Job Description: -Represent and reflect Dynamic’s company principles and ethics in all dealings with employees and customers.-Develop strategy and assist Business Support Manager and Service Managers to provide products knowledge to customer regarding the advantages of the preventive maintenance, the service contract should get after the warranty is expired.-Utilizes available management or financial tools to monitor, control and/or improve all operating costs including direct payroll costs, staff productivity and administration costs.-Analyses current market data reporting and reacting to relevant market trends and developments.-Analyses updates and reports current and projected financial and operational performance monthly.-Supervises and participates, where required, including costing review, sales negotiation.Ensures a proper flow of processes between departments.-Ensures all contracts or orders meet are profitable and meet customer specific requirements and contractual scope.-Responsible and accountable for addressing compliance without adversely impacting TSS.-Monitor service support to internal/external customers.-In order of important, list in brief statements the major activities and end results for which this job is responsible. ---For each major activity, state “What is done” (action) and then “Why it is done” (end result expected). Do not list individual tasks or steps. Use specific action verbs.For Example: ** Negotiate with suppliers to achieve favorable terms for the company on capital equipment and service agreements.-Contributes with Deputy Business Director, Business Support Manager to the implementation of an operational framework including establishing metrics, key performance indicators and service level for driving the performance of service delivery.-Establishes and maintains regular day-to-day communications with internal and external customers and vendors for reporting, operations, and shared work.-Regular meeting with Business Support Manager as well as Service Managers for all service schedules to ensure providing service to customer on time.-Monitor service and company workflow to recommend or making a request to adjust if necessary.-To facilitate the service works to make process run smoothly.-Review and approval on quotation for offering to customer.-To purchase spare part and service products if necessary.-Monitor stock inventory of non-moving and slow-moving stocks and report to Business Director.-Review for all service request from service managers including tools and materials needed.-Develop and set KPI with team, monitor and review KPI routinely.-To prepare monthly report for all activities and submit to Business Director as per the agreed schedule.-Monitor AR and AP and discuss with service managers to address if any issue.-To assist and cooperate with colleagues in sales and service activities.-Understanding written and verbal project briefs, and working alongside team members to develop plans, work schedules, and target.-Attract, manage, retain, and grow the Business Unit Managers and relevant staff to ensure their competency and ability to meet future division’s business requirements.-Provides motivational leadership for direct reports at all levels, from team leads to individual contributors, including performance planning and development support, coaching and mentoring, rewards and recognition, and staff retention to develop a continuous improvement Dynamic’s culture.-Identifies and maintains appropriate staffing levels and provides continuity through succession planning.-Contributes with the Business Director and Business Support Manager to manage staff turnover and vacancies through proper selection and motivation procedures.-Review, prepare and assign the necessary training to develop the relevant skills and knowledge for the future development for team and individual needs.

(Degree can be substituted with additional 4 years of relevant work experience).-Extensive hands-on experience executing medium or large-scale of medical equipment business, strong technical knowledge of operating systems and knowledge of best practices in managing and optimizing.-Strong knowledge of Technical Background from Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering and Biomedical Engineering.-A good command of the English language (both verbal and written).-Excellent people management (leadership) skills.-Strong problem solving and decision-making skills.-Understands how to deliver through and with others in a way that motivates and drives high performance.-Networking skills to generate new business leads.-Ability and willingness to work in a matrix organization.-Strong strategic capability and coupled with problem solving skills finding new and creative solutions to our client’s needs.-People management, self-motivation and a positive outlook on things will help get you through the tough times when pressure is high, and client demands unwavering.

Job Description:
菲娜医美机构正在寻找一位总经理，负责我们美容院的日常运作。总经理的职责包括监督员工、安排班次、推广我们的服务、记录费用和收入。

主要职责：
- 监督诊所的日常运作
- 根据美容院的需要，雇用和培训美容师
- 考虑到高峰期和季节性，安排员工的轮班
- 订购美容产品
- 安排所有设备的定期维修服务
- 在所有美容站应用卫生规范
- 确保所有的美容护理符合高质量标准
- 保持工作人员记录，包括工资和工作时间表
- 在社交媒体上宣传服务、产品和折扣
- 接收客户的付款并确认所有交易
- 开展在线竞赛并提供折扣套餐以吸引新客户
Job Requirement:
- 中文和英文优秀者优先（本地、台湾或马来西亚华人女性优先）
- 至少有3年的美容诊所工作经验
- 对美容护理和产品有了解
- 优秀的组织能力
- 有能力处理客户的要求和投诉
- 商业管理或相关领域的学位

*** 薪资范围： US$4K 至 US$ 8K，外加佣金
*** 提供其他福利

job title: VP & Head of Financial Reporting Department
position: VP & Head of Financial Reporting Department
Job Description:
Report to : Chief Finance Officer

- Ensure financial report is accurately prepared based on data from system in accordance with CAS and submit to Group Company and users on timely manner. 
- Ensure statutory financial statements comply with required accounting standards and guidelines issued by NBC.
- Prepare CoA report to NBC following CAS and CIFRS.
- Coordinate with internal and external auditors. 
- Review the policy and procedures of the Bank to ensure that it is comply with the group’s accounting policy and procedure.
- Monitor daily accounting transactions to be sent to Group Company.
- Provide sufficient data to Group for TFRS conversion.
- Perform analytical review of the report under TFRS.
- Prepare reporting package as the requirement under TFRS.
- Prepare reporting as the requirement under USGAAP.
- Update the new law and regulation to Group Company (Fin GRC) on the quarterly basis. 
- Coordinate, monitor and disclose related parties’ transaction on time.
- Coordinate and respond to any inquiries or request by Group Company.
- Involve in accounting related projects required by Group Company.
- Conduct training on financial reporting as required.
- Lead and manage staffs under Financial Reporting Department.
- Perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned by management.
Job Requirement:
- Full commitment to Hattha Bank’s vision, mission, purposes, values, procedures and objectives.
- Bachelor degree in Finance and Banking, Accounting and Finance, or other related fields (Pursuing/Qualified ACCA is preferable).
- At least 5 years professional experiences in accounting and tax related fields.
- Experience as external auditor and have knowledge in CIFRS is an advantage.
- Have a good skill in MS Office includes Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet & Email.
- Advanced analytical, organization, and interpersonal skills. 
- Ability to work under pressure and long-hours, highly self-motivated, strong sense of urgency with high level of commitment and determination in delivering a great result.
- High proficiency in writing, speaking, reading, and listening English.

*** Benefits: 
- Competitive Salary
- Annual Leave
- Annual Salary Increment	
- Pchum Ben Bonus
- Uniform Allowance
- Career Development	
- Annual Bonus
- Retention Bonus
- 13th Month Bonus	
- Insurance (Infinity & NSSF)
- Other benefit…

** HOW TO APPLY
Interest candidate, please submit us your Application Form or CV (attached with National ID Card or Birth Letter) via email: career@hatthabank.com or our nearest branches. Disability people and women are encouraged and taken care to select.
More information: 069 222 800 – 086 354 354
Company Profile:
Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description:
POSITION PURPOSE
The People Experience Manager (Cambodia) is responsible for driving all people related matters and managing the day-to-day implementation of People Experience (PX) initiatives and policies in both operational and strategic levels to achieve high performance and high engagement organisation. 
The role will be working closely with the Country Director (CD), Country Leadership Team (CLT), Regional PX Director (RPXD) and the PX teams in both Regional and Global offices, to develop and deliver a number of work programs and campaigns aiming to provide our people with the best
employment experience across all three business units: Student Placement, IELTS and English Language Teaching, and support functions.
 Manage employee lifecycle processes from attraction and acquisition of talents to on-
boarding, capability and career development through to exit and separation.
 Support and advise the management team to provide great work environments for our
people through supporting facility management, occupational health and safety and
broad administration activities specifically for the Cambodia’s offices
 Deliver great employee experiences through effectively administrating employee
processes and records in SuccessFactors (personnel database)
JOB ANNOUNCEMENT AT IDP

JOB DESCRIPTION
An ASX100 business part that is owned by Australian universities, IDP is a pioneer in international
education services. Our core business lines include student placement to Australia, US, UK, Canada
and New Zealand institutions, English-language testing and training. 
We are on a mission to build the world's leading platform and connected community to guide students
along their journey to achieve their lifelong learning and career aspirations.
As a co-owner of IELTS, we deliver the English test that is trusted by more governments, universities
and organisations than any other. We also operate English language teaching schools in South East
Asia. 
We are innovators, driven by the needs of our customers and deep data insights. Our 5,000 team
members based around the world understand that our services change lives – not only of our
customers, but their wider communities. 
By combining empathy and professional expertise with digital excellence, we create launch pads for our
customers to achieve global success. 

POSITION PURPOSE
The People Experience Manager (Cambodia) is responsible for driving all people related matters and
managing the day-to-day implementation of People Experience (PX) initiatives and policies in both
operational and strategic levels to achieve high performance and high engagement organisation. 
The role will be working closely with the Country Director (CD), Country Leadership Team (CLT),
Regional PX Director (RPXD) and the PX teams in both Regional and Global offices, to develop and
deliver a number of work programs and campaigns aiming to provide our people with the best
employment experience across all three business units: Student Placement, IELTS and English
Language Teaching, and support functions. 

- Directly support CD and CLT to create a collaborative work environment across departments through effective internal communications via such channels as internal social network website (JAM), emails, bulletin boards, newsletters, town hall, social events, and instant messaging groups, etc.
- Collaborate with the Regional and Global PX teams to implement new projects and campaigns to improve and enhance employees' experiences.
- Oversee payroll data preparation, and coordinate with the Finance department to ensure pay is made to the employees correctly and on time
- Oversee the statutory compliance together with Global Privacy Data Officer

RESPONSIBILITIES 
 People Data and Process Integrity:

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sothea Thannarith (Mr.)  070555494 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070555494

Through the creation of new facilities and spaces, this development will create opportunities for the growth of commerce, culture, arts and sports in Phnom Penh City Center (PPCC). Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

job title: មន្ត្រីឥណទាន (ច្រើននាក់)
position: មន្ត្រីឥណទាន (ច្រើននាក់)
Job Description:
** ភារកិច្ច និង ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ផលិតផល សេវាកម្ម​ របស់ គ្រឹះស្ថាន ដល់អតិថិជន នៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ ដើម្បីទាក់ទាញ អតិថិជនលើការផ្តល់សេវាកម្ម និងឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងតម្រូវការផ្សេងៗរបស់អតិថិជន។
- ធ្វើការវាយតំលៃក្នុងការផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់អតិថិជន ដោយផ្អែកទៅលើគោលការណ៍ឥណទានរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន។
- រៀបចំឯកសារឥណទាន និងធ្វើការណែនាំដល់អតិថិជន លើការប្រើសេវាកម្មឥណទាន។
- រៀបចំឯកសារស្នើសុំឥណទាន ដាក់ជូន លោកប្រធានសាខា ឬ លោកប្រធានខេត្ត។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដានលើការសងប្រាក់កម្ចីត្រឡប់របស់អតិថិជន និងការប្រមូលឥណទានសងត្រឡប់របស់អតិថិជន។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដានការផ្តល់កម្ចីក្នុងតំបន់គ្រប់គ្រង និងរក្សាការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជនចាស់ និងអតិថិជនថ្មី ក៏ដូចជាអាជ្ញាធរដែនដីនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ។
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សកម្មភាពឥណទានប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ជូនថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង។
- បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖ ប្រាក់បៀវត្ស ២០០​ ដល់ ៣០០ ដុល្លារ ប្រចាំខែ បូកនឹងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖ ធានារ៉ាប់រង សុខភាព & គ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ ប្រាក់ចូលនិវត្តន៍ ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ ប្រាក់ភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ ប្រាក់បុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំប្រពៃណីជាតិ ឯកសណ្ឋាន កាតទូរស័ព្ទ ប្រាក់ជួលម៉ូតូ ប្រាក់ថ្លៃសាំង និង ប្រាក់បៀវត្សឡើងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ។ ផុតកំណត់ទទួលពាក្យ៖ ថ្ងៃទី៣១ ខែឧសភា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង ១៧:០០ ល្ងាច។
Job Requirement:
- បេក្ខជនត្រូវជាសញ្ជាតិខ្មែរ ។
- បេក្ខជនត្រូវមានអាយុចាប់ពី១៨ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៣៥ឆ្នាំ។
- មានចំណេះដឹង វិជ្ជានព្វន្ត និងការកត់ត្រាមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ ។
- ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងទូទៅ បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ និស្សិតកំពុងសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬ បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ គ្រប់ជំនាញ ឬ សញ្ញាបត្រ​ដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ
មានអាទិភាព ។
- និយាយ និងសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ និង ភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដែលអាចអាន ស្តាប់ និង សរសេរបានខ្លះៗ។
- ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូយ៉ាងស្ទាត់ជំនាញ និង មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរម៉ូតូកាន់តែប្រសើរ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងវិស័យមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានអាទិភាពជាចម្បង។
- មានសុខភាពល្អ និង សមត្ថភាពការងារខ្ពស់។
- មានអត្តចរិកល្អ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឹងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារ មានការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អក្នុងការធ្វើការជាក្រុម និងមាន​ការប្តេជ្ញា​ចិត្ត​ខ្ពស់​ចំពោះ​ការងារ។

- បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមអញ្ជើញមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារ នៅគ្រប់ការិយាល័យសាខារបស់គ្រឹះស្ថានដែល​នៅជិត​លោកអ្នក។​
- បេក្ខជនត្រូវបំពេញ ពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារជាមួយប្រាក់បៀវត្សរំពឹងទុក និងភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ រូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្ន ៤ គុណ ៦ ចំនួន៣សន្លឹក ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ សំបុត្រកំណើតថតចម្លង សញ្ញាបត្រ និង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ផ្សេងៗ (ថតចម្លង) ។
- ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែមអំពីការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក សូមទំនាក់ទំនងមកទូរស័ព្ទលេខ៖ ០១០ ៨៨៨ ៨២១ ​តាមរយៈអ៊ីម៉ែលៈ sopheak@seilanithih.com.kh ឬ វេបសាយ៖ www.seilanithih.com.kh

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

Job Description:
To carry out the reception and control of merchandise and its storage in the stockroom, in addition to store replenishment according to company procedures, in order to ensure the store has the right product at the right time.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

STOCKROOM MANAGEMENT

To receive and confirm boxes every day in an optimal manner.
To open the boxes received in an organised and systematic manner, according to store needs.
To organise and allocate the merchandise received according to stockroom guidelines.
To perform daily replenishment on a continual basis, according to store needs.
To reorganise stockroom space in an optimal manner according to the stage of the season and store needs – start of the season, sale period, etc.
Responsibility for maintaining a clean and tidy stockroom.
To carry out the re-labelling of garments as required (sale period, promotions, etc.).
To perform transfers and pickings quickly and specifically according to instructions from managers.
To participate actively and systematically in the end of season return, according to company guidelines.
Responsibility for controlling and monitoring stockroom materials - alarms, Pathfinder, adhesive tape, etc.
To collaborate in other store maintenance tasks, as required.o be able to deal with individual store requests quickly and efficiently.

PRODUCT

To be familiar with the products of each season - collection, initial order, colours, sizes, etc.
To use the different product lists for managing the stockroom (pending packages, transmission, initial order, etc.).
To participate in updating the Merchandising and Rotation rail.
To collaborate in preparing all the material required to perform the store changes.
To be able to recommend alternative garments when out of stock items are requested.
To report to the team any issues that may affect sales (entries of repetitions, catalogue garments, etc.).
Responsibility for organising and re-allocating surplus clothing.
To be aware at all times of the newest products and what has been withdrawn to the stockroom.
To deal with flaws in accordance with company standards.
Job Requirement:
Proactive and able to take the initiative.
Organised with a certain degree of autonomy.
Flexible, adapts to the needs of the stockroom and the store.
Good communicator – listens actively and communicates in a clear and structured manner.
Manages his/her time efficiently.
Committed and willing to improve.
Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
Goods reception and handling standards and protocol.
Procedure for transfers and goods returns.
To be familiar with the different lists for managing the stockroom (pending packages, initial order, out of stock items, repetitions, etc.).
Partial inventories protocol.
Basic Customer Service Standards.
The entire collection - references, models, sizes, colours, etc.
The Rankings and the most important product lists – Best Sellers, replenishments, etc.
Organisation and application.
Able to prioritise and commercially oriented.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.

Job Description:

Preferred

Job Description:
•បង្រៀន និងធានាឲ្យបាននូវគុណភាពនៃការអប់រំ ទាំងចំណេះដឹង បំណិន និងអភិវឌ្ឍបុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈ
•បំពេញកិច្ចការដ្ឋបាលសាលា និងរដ្ឋបាលថ្នាក់រៀន
•ពង្រឹងវិន័យសិស្សឲ្យបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន។
•ណែនាំ និងសម្របសម្រួលសកម្មភាពរបស់សិស្ស
•ពិនិត្យតាមដាន និងធ្វើរង្វាយតម្លៃជាប្រចាំដល់សិស្ស
•សាកសួរដល់ផ្ទះសិស្ស និងជំនួបរវាងមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស
•ជួយសិស្សក្នុងការស្រាវជ្រាវឯកសារក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ និងអភិវឌ្ឍបំណិនជីវិត
•រក្សាឲ្យបាននូវបរិស្ថានថ្នាក់រៀនប្រកបដោយសុវត្ថិភាព និងមិនប៉ះពាល់ដល់សុខភាព
•សម្ភារបរិក្ខារ និងសម្ភារឧបទេស ដែលបានបំពាក់ក្នុងថ្នាក់ ត្រូវធានាឲ្យបាននូវការថែរក្សា ប្រកបដោយការយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ និងត្រឹមត្រូវ
•ប្រើប្រាស់ទីធ្លាលេងកម្សាន្ត ដែលជាផ្នែកមួយនៃសកម្មភាពសិក្សាក្រៅថ្នាក់ ដើម្បីធានាថាទីធ្លាលេងកម្សាន្តនោះប្រកបដោយសុវត្ថិភាព
•បំពេញកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗចាត់តាំងដោយប្រធាន
Job Requirement:
•និសិ្សត ឬមានសញ្ញាបត្រមធ្យមសិក្សាគរុកោសល្យផ្នែកមធ្យមសិក្សា
•បទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនចំណេះទូទៅខេមរភាសា កម្រិតមធ្យមសិក្សា
•យល់ដឹងអំពីច្បាប់អប់រំប្រទេសកម្ពុជា
•យល់ដឹងអំពីក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវគ្រូបង្រៀន និងច្បាប់ស្តីពីការអប់រំ
•ចេះកសាងសម្ភារឧបទេស និងតុបតែងថ្នាក់រៀន
•អាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសសម្រាប់ទាក់ទងប្រចាំថ្ងៃបាន កាន់តែប្រសើរ
•អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Ms. Word & Excel
•មានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើការដោយឯករាជ្យ និងជាក្រុម

Job Description:
The Factory Administration & GA is respond to oversee overall daily administrative task & duties assigned that related to factory management such fixed asset movement control, office safety & hygiene), compliance matter & to ensure the effectively service providing to all division in factory.

** Main Duties and Responsibilities
- Manage the front-factory, inside area & reception areas & to ensure the factory is secured, also serving as the first point of contact for guests, employees, job candidates, and vendors;
- Monitor and control the security team from entrance to exit by ensuring day to day safety by ensure security team follow the company’s policy and procedures and ensure the
office premises are secure and locked up out of operation hours.
- To Supervise & Monitoring cleaner job to ensure the factory is clean & hygiene.
- To Supervise & Monitoring cooker job to ensure they are follow the food safety policy and provide instruction, assign the cooker to organized the kitchen, food storage room and ensure cooker has arranged enough food on time and don’t missing meal for anyone.
- Revie the necessary items in stock on hand & making order office supplies, stationary, tonner, printing, food etc.
- Create admin inventory check list & count it by following the schedule in order to ensure the all items is not lose.
- Deliver ID Card, Business Card, Door Access Card, Sim Card , uniform etc. and collect back when staff resign.
- Manage factory budget and small cash to ensure the factory administrative expense while they need.
- Support HR Team for recruitment campaign such skill worker & non-skill worker
- Deal with Authority as need.
- Managing administrative documents for future audit.
- Other Job assign by Factory Director & HR Manager

● Bachelor Degree in HR/ Administrative or related field
● 2-3 Years experience in administrative, facility, office
management & support administrative service;
● Hands on experience with purchasing processes,
● Good communication & leadership.
● Strong sense of organization and resourcefulness
● Ability to use Ms. Office (Word & Excel)
● Be able to communicate in English (Writing , Email, Listening & medium Speaking)
● Proven experience in writing memos, letter.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:
Financial Planning
• Yearly Business Planning - Leading the overall Yearly Business Plan Process of the Company by supervising, reviewing, and pre-aligning with the finance leaders in the country the business plan process and eventually consolidated business plan for discussion and approval by the Country GM and CFO
• Quarterly Rolling Estimates - leading the overall Quarterly Rolling Estimates of the Company by supervising, reviewing, and pre-aligning with business leaders
• Monthly BP / RE Review - actual results vs Business Plan/Rolling Estimates reconciliations are done, variances are understood and explained.  Risks and opportunities to the full year budget are highlighted and properly communicated

Financial Analysis
• Decision support - responsible for ensuring that a robust analysis is done by the team for projects/initiatives that would have an impact on the Company’s P&L, both in the short-term and the long-term
• Sales & Operations Planning - responsible for reviewing, and ensuring that impact of updated S&OP forecasts is highlighted to the CFO and the rest of the Leadership team in order to ensure that plans are put in place to mitigate potential risks, and also understand where there are opportunities

CAPEX Management
• Long-range planning for Capital Expenditures for the Company based on projected growth
• Yearly Business Plan review and alignment of Capital expenditures with finance director and rest of leadership team in line with growth projections and current capacity
• Review and alignment of capex projects for final approval/authorization to spend
• Review of post-mortem analysis done for CAPEX projects.  Highlight the results of post-mortem study to Management
Job Requirement:
Ideal candidates who we believe would be successful in this role: 
• Bachelor’s Degree in finance, Accounting, or ACCA
• Completed CA/CPA/ MBA preferred
• Experiences in financial planning and analysis relevant experience with a multi-national Company
• At least 5 years’ experience in managing people and organizations Credible leader when resolving issues related to financial standards and processes; must apply business knowledge and communicate this effectively.  
• Minimum 3 year’ experience in a similar business field
• Has competency in strategic planning and business development
• Basic computer skills, with ability to use Microsoft office, SAP, and Power BI
• Ability to meet deadlines with strong attention to consistency, detail, and quality

Job Description: Country Accountant We’re looking for a meticulous, highly-organised and friendly individual to join our global, diverse team. Join us as our Country Accountant in Siem Reap, Cambodia!  About the Opportunity As our Country Accountant for Siem Reap, Cambodia you will perform professional accounting tasks including bookkeeping, verifying fiscal records, preparing financial and statistical reports, as well as providing information on best accounting practices and procedures. In your role you will co-ordinate with internal and external parties and ensure business needs for senior leaders and smooth financial processes are met. You will carry out routine bookkeeping duties and maintain a working knowledge of statutes to ensure all financial information meets the necessary statutory and regulatory compliance standards, and accordingly liaise with tax consultants and auditors.  About you  The Essentials: Minimum tertiary qualification or a bachelor’s degree in finance  1 year finance experience Leadership experience in a regional capacity would be an advantage Good knowledge of local tax regulations Fluent in written and verbal English The Attributes:  Well-developed problem-solving skills  Solid collaboration and communication skills (verbal and written)  High attention to detail and strong time/priority management skills  Strong interpersonal and presentation skills across cultures, with a friendly, engaging demeanour  An individual who appreciates the travel industry and collaborating with people from various backgrounds and cultures  Comfortable with a flexible rotating roster that may include late nights, weekends and early mornings   Able to adapt to uncertainties/changing priorities and remain calm under pressure  Willing to travel on business when required   About us Discova is a leading global, B2B destination management company with operations in 15 destinations in the Americas and Asia. With 95% of our people being locals and having grown up in the communities we operate in, we are motivated by a deep commitment to sustainable livelihoods while preserving the beauty of the places we call home.  Some benefits you can expect (there are more) In addition to basic annual leave: 1 day volunteer leave, 1 day birthday leave, 5 days study leave Working in a multicultural, open and innovative working environment Curated in-house learning courses and opportunities for up-skilling
Job Requirement: Heath InsuranceTravel DiscountWork from home
Company Profile: About UsThe Discova brand was launched in July 2019 and is the newest brand in the Flight Centre Travel Group family of brands.  The merger of Buffalo Tours in Asia and Olympus Tours in the Americas created a global DMC business with more than 20 years experience in delivering amazing travel experiences to our customers. With a purpose to connect people and places with a world of possibilities, we are the travel people who work globally, live locally and go the extra mile to help our partners extend their reach.Finally, if you are successful, you will find out that working with Discova is more than just a job. To be part of the Discova family is to be in your element. We offer an exciting career progression globally and a fantastic and supportive team culture and social events that are the envy of the industry.Get in touch now and Discova a world of possibilities.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR HR Manager  parnpailin.boonwan@discova.com Siem Reap discova cambodia

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
Raffles Medical Cambodia are looking for Customer Service Representatives to effectively maintain the
highest level of client service standards through support of the clinic staff and by providing efficient and
consistent delivery of non-medical support services to clients.

Key Responsibilities
- Greets the patient in a warm and friendly manner – speaking English.
- Assist the patient in completing information forms, Insurance forms, making appointments. Also,
answer any questions the patient might have.
- Admits new patients to the system (manually and on computer)
- Maintains the reception areas in relation to tidiness, stationary & supplies.
- Maintains the paper or electronic file that constitutes the Medical Records and obtains that record from the files for the patient and/or doctor.
- Logs appointments & notifies doctor, staff & patient of the time & date.
- Logs all files that are taken out of the clinic
- Reviews the treatment form and processes an invoice for patient. Reminds the doctor if all the treatment forms have not been complete
- Makes credit card transactions and receives authorization for credit card payment.
- Answers all questions the patient may have concerning the invoice payment
- Assists accounting in reconciliation of daily cash with the accounting department.
- Keeping up-to-date lists of credit agreements, Raffles Medical membership and procedures.
- Administrates cashless medical service (CMS) & direct billing claims to insurance companies
- Working with the accounting department concerning lost receipts, receipts for insurance purposes, refunds, daily deposits of cash, credit card receipts, checks, and credit problems & accounts receivables.
- Process closing day and back up report through the computer system in the morning and evening time.
- Maintains confidentiality of all clients and Raffles Medical business.
- Is familiar with the SOPP’s for the Immigration Visa Health Check Clinic & follows the Raffles Medical
& embassy SOPP’s implicitly.
- Notifies supervisor or Senior Management staff when an issue, incident or accident arises with a client or staff.
- Ensures that any accounts receivable are followed up daily and activity recorded.
- Assist in the administration of all insurance Claims (Life/Accident/Prepaid programs)– Insurance Claims.
- Be available to work any shift according to Roster requirements.
- Is familiar with the infection control SOPP’s & hazardous exposure SOPP.
- Complete other tasks / projects assigned by the Manager.
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Knowledge and skill of customer services
- Interpersonal, presentation and communication skills
- Good organizational skills
- Computer literacy (MS Office, internet, email, etc)
- Customer focused with good customer-handling skills.
- Ability to interact with various cultures and all levels in a multinational environment.
- Ability to analyze / solve problems in a fast paced environment.
- Multi tasking capabilities to accommodate a multi-unit organization.
- Able to demonstrate friendly, tactful attitude and empathy to patients.
- Will demonstrate good team work with other staff.

Required Competencies
- Supervisory and leadership skills
- Excellent organizational skills
- Conflict and complaint handling skills
- Change management skills

Required Work Experience
- At least 1 years of experience in customer service, however fresh graduates with no relevant experience is invited to apply.

Required Qualifications
-  University degree or 4th-year university student in English, management or related field

Required Languages
- English and Khmer
Company Profile:
Raffles Medical Cambodia was opened in 1992 and is renowned for the delivery of comprehensive international standards of medical services. The staff consists of well qualified doctors and nurses who are familiar with the health dynamics in Cambodia, and are able to provide full support for expatriates, residents and tourists for day to day health management, vaccinations, medical stabilization and treatment in the event of a medical emergency.

Patients will receive the same high level of service and renowned quality of care, with continued access to our panel of international and local doctors. Patients and onshore panel of doctors can also expect to benefit from access to the clinical expertise and support from the Raffles specialists in Singapore.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  023 216 911 / 012 497 761 saly_man@rafflesmedical.com No 161, Street 51 Beoung Raing, Duan Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 023 216 911 / 012 497 761

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
Raffles Medical Cambodia are looking for a full-time nurse to deliver a high standard and quality of professional nursing care to all patients or clients at Raffles Medical Clinic in Phnom Penh. The incumbent is also expected to work collaboratively with the team and other colleagues to address the needs of patients and other stakeholders, according to specified policies and practices compliant with Raffles Medical and national
requirements.

Key Responsibilities
- Provide the highest possible level of nursing care to all patients consistent with international standards
- Take and monitor vital signs of patients and check for any irregularities in their conditions
- Prioritize health problems and intervene appropriately to assist the patient in complex, urgent or emergency situations, including initiation of effective emergency care
- Maintain and process patients’ records and report patients’ conditions to doctors/physicians
- Help patients to get ready for tests and other examinations
- Implement patient care program
- Clean wounds and cuts
- Advise, support and, where appropriate, administer vaccinations for patients
- Attend various meetings, workshops, and training as required to maintain updated on skills and knowledge of best nursing practices
- Implement in compliance with nursing policies and procedures
- Utilize and demonstrate sensitive communication styles, to ensure patients are fully informed and consent to treatment
- Communicate effectively with patients and caregivers, recognizing the need for alternative methods of communication to overcome different levels of understanding, cultural background and preferred ways.
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Strong understanding of nursing process.
- Strong understanding of emergency protocols and nursing actions during an emergency
- Attention to details and problem-solving approach.
- Computer literacy.
- Customer focused with good customer-handling skills.
- Ability to interact with various cultures and all levels in a multinational environment.
- Ability to analyze / solve problems in a fast paced environment.
- Multi tasking capabilities to accommodate a multi-unit organization.
- Able to demonstrate a professional manner at all times
- Able to demonstrate friendly, tactful attitude and empathy to patients.
- Will demonstrate knowledge in all aspects of nursing and technical ability to operate all medical equipment.
- Will demonstrate good team work with other staff.
- Will demonstrate punctuality and good attendance.

Required Competencies
- Physically, emotionally, and mentally fit
- Customer care
- Teamwork
- Problem solving
- Interpersonal and communication skills
- Sympathy

Required Work Experience
- At least one year’s experience working as a nurse preferable in a high dependency or emergency area.

Required Qualifications
- Nursing Diploma or Bachelor Degree or country equivalent.

Required Languages
- Proficient in English
- Khmer

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
To provide competent, patient-centered care that addresses health needs and promotes wellness. Such care is based on latest evidence and guidelines, and meets legislator requirements. Also, to provide peer support to other doctors of the same practice.

Key Responsibilities
- Provide skilled health assessment, diagnosis and treatment services to patients
- Order diagnostic tests as needed, check and follow up the results in a timely manner
- Administer and prescribe treatment and drugs effectively
- Refer patients appropriately, in consultation with Supervisor, to other healthcare providers if their needs exceed the range of care the Clinic is able to provide
- Consult, collaborate and work constructively and harmoniously with colleagues to provide optimal care
- Document all care provided and education or information given to patients within their medical health record, as per professional and practice standards
- Participate in annual performance appraisal and set work and personal goals for the upcoming year
- Maintain a working knowledge of legislation that affects medical practices
- Provide services courteously and respectfully with regard to the cultural beliefs and needs of patients
- Respond openly to complaints or feedback
- Declare vested interests in services that you may be referring to
- Demonstrate a working knowledge of company policy with regard to clinic practices as described in Standard Operating Procedures and Policies
- Report incidents as required
- Protect and maintain the confidentiality of medical information or records of patients
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Medical Skill
- English Communication
- Computer: Word, Excel
- Customer centric.
- Service Mind
- Good Interpersonal Skill

Required Competencies
- Strong interpersonal communication
- Active listening skill
- Ability to use computerized patient management systems
- Ability to keep a cool head in emergency situations

Required Work Experience
- At least 5 year experience as a general practitioner / doctor
- Experience working in a multinational working environment

Required Qualifications
- Registration or license as a General Practitioner

Required Languages
- English
-  Khmer

Travel / Rotation Requirements
- N/A

Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 656 242 sokhim.pek@onionev.com Phnom Penh HQ: , #93B, St590, Vllage13, Sangkat Boeng kok, Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010 656 242

Job Description:
* Funding and Treasury:
- Perform treasury activities related to borrowings, debt, cash flow and capital management.
- Prepare financial modeling and financial forecasting to support debt funding proposal and decision.
- Prepare funding for new investment and monitor investment funding.
- Collaborate with relevant departments to obtain and clarify information for funding transactions.
- Provide financial planning and analysis in the conduct of treasury activities. 
- Liaise with debt providers, bankers, and lawyers on funding transactions.
- Review legal documents related to funding and borrowing needs.
- Maintain and ensure all financial covenants and all undertakings of debt funding transactions are adhered to and complied with.
- Oversee and optimize corporate cash management.
- Prepare materials and reports on a timely basis
- Update and/or create policies and procedures.
- Get other tasks done as assigned.

*Financial Risk Management:
- Administer and provide recommendation on business insurance programs.
- Negotiate and purchase financial hedging instrument where appropriate.
- Research current and future market trends and anticipate the possible effect on the company’s financial risk aspects.
- Make recommendations to reduce or control risks including credit, market,operational, and regulatory risks.
- Present ideas via reports and presentations, outline findings and make recommendations for improvements in process in the department where risk incur.
- Develop contingency plans to deal with emergencies.
- Get other tasks done as assigned.
Job Requirement:
- Education in Finance, Banking, Accounting or a related field.
- At least 5 years of experience in Banking, Treasury, Finance, Accounting, Risk Management and related areas.
- Knowledge of process or steps to get borrowing or funding
- Sound understanding of banking, financial products and risk management.
- Knowledge of payment & cash management.
- Knowledge of business and project management is a plus.
- Strong numeric and analytical skills.
- High attention to details.
- Strong interpersonal skills.
- Ability to work under pressure.
- Be a team player with the ability to work with less supervision.
- Be self-motivated and performance focused.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
To provide competent, patient-centered care that addresses health needs and promotes wellness. Such care is based on latest evidence and guidelines, and meets legislator requirements. Also, to provide peer support to other doctors of the same practice.

Key Responsibilities
- Provide skilled health assessment, diagnosis and treatment services to patients
- Order diagnostic tests as needed, check and follow up the results in a timely manner
- Administer and prescribe treatment and drugs effectively
- Refer patients appropriately, in consultation with Supervisor, to other healthcare providers if their needs exceed the range of care the Clinic can provide
- Consult, collaborate and work constructively and harmoniously with colleagues to provide optimal care
- Document all care provided and education or information given to patients within their medical health record, as per professional and practice standards
- Participate in annual performance appraisal and set work and personal goals for the upcoming year
- Maintain a working knowledge of legislation that affects medical practices
- Provide services courteously and respectfully with regard to the cultural beliefs and needs of patients
- Respond openly to complaints or feedback
- Declare vested interests in services that you may be referring to
- Demonstrate a working knowledge of company policy with regard to clinic practices as described in Standard Operating Procedures and Policies
- Report incidents as required
- Protect and maintain the confidentiality of medical information or records of patients
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Medical Skill
- Chinese and English Communication
- Computer: Word, Excel
- Customer centric.
- Customer Service Mindset
- Good Interpersonal Skill

Required Competencies
- Strong interpersonal communication
- Active listening skill
- Ability to use computerized patient management systems
- Ability to keep a cool head in emergency situations

Required Work Experience
- At least 5 year experience as a general practitioner / doctor
- Experience working in a multinational working environment

Required Qualifications
- Registration or license as a General Practitioner

Required Languages
- Chinese
- English

Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.

Job Description:
A.Overall Purpose Of The Job: 
To undertake a range of tasks and responsibilities using efficient and sound judgment and conducting all aspects of work tasks in a consistent, objective and professional manner.
To effectively maintain the highest level of client service standards through support of the clinic staff and by providing efficient and consistent delivery of non-medical support to clients.

B. Key Responsibilities: 
 • Strong understanding of laboratory process.
 • Strong understanding or infection control principles & procedures
 • Strong understanding of laboratory quality control principles & procedures
 • Attention to details and problem-solving approach.
 • Computer literacy.
 • Customer focused with good customer-handling skills.
 • Ability to interact with various cultures and all levels in a multinational environment.
 • Ability to analyze / solve problems in a fast-paced environment.  
 • Multi-tasking capabilities to accommodate a multi-unit organization.
 • Able to demonstrate a professional manner at all times
 • Able to demonstrate friendly, tactful attitude and empathy to patients.
 • Will demonstrate initiative
 • Will demonstrate knowledge in all aspects of laboratory technical ability to operate all laboratory equipment.
 • Will demonstrate good team work with other staff.
 • Will demonstrate punctuality and good attendance.
 • Will demonstrate neat and clean personal appearance.
 • Will report to work on time, wear Raffles Medical issued uniform

DUTIES / RESPONSIBILITIES
• To provide laboratory support to Raffles Medical’s medical services
• To perform laboratory tests, as per equipment provided at Raffles Medical for general practice, emergency practice, medical check-up and occupational health programs as directed by clinic Doctor
• To provide supportive laboratory services on an emergency basis to the local community, as directed by and to the level permitted by the Raffles Medical Clinic Manager
• Responsible for documentation of accurate records related to laboratory results.
• Responsible for alerting the Senior Laboratory Technician & Clinic Manager of any maintenance requirements as observed.
• Responsible for knowing how to use and maintain laboratory equipment and maintaining an accurate record of maintenance and checking.
• Responsible for the safe handling and disposal of all specimens and equipment used in testing those specimens according to the designated Raffles Medical Infection Control Policy & Procedure Manual.
• Report all hazardous exposure incidents as per the POP.
• Maintain accurate records of hazardous exposure incidents
• Review the incident to reduce the risks
• Be able to verbalize & understand the Hazardous exposure POP.
• Report possible hazardous risks immediately
• To prepare accurate reports & checklists of laboratory actions on a regular basis including types and number of tests performed, usage of chemicals/reagents, extra-ordinary tests performed or sent to other sites, turnaround times, when required and maintenance/repair of site laboratory equipment requirements.
• Liaises with an outside provider to establish & maintain a quality control program & reports on this program monthly.
• Liaises with outside service providers to ensure quality service, control tests, cost comparison and cost containment.
• Promotes a professional image by adhering to the dress code
• Maintains confidentiality of information related to Raffles Medical employees, business and clients
• Performs similar duties as assigned by the Clinic Manager
Job Requirement:
Required Competencies
• Customer focused
• Quality focused

Required Work Experience
• At least 1 years of relevant experience.

Required Qualifications
• Diploma/Degree of Laboratory or country equivalent

Required Languages
• Proficient in English and Khmer

Company Profile: Volumecocomo Apparel (Cambodia) Inc. (VCAC) was formed in Cambodia in 2006 by U.S. shareholders as an apparel manufacturing company selling women’s garments to U.S. wholesaler.  It performs all apparel manufacturing functions including patterning, marking, making samples, material purchasing, production, IT, shipping, administration and accounting.  Cocovol Apparel Cambodia, Inc. (”Cocovol”) took over VCAC’s operation in 2014.

Company Profile:
DFI Lucky Private Limited is a member of Dairy Farm International Group, one of the region’s most respected retailers, currently running 6,500 outlets and over 180,000 employees. In Cambodia, we’re operating a successful chain of branded subsidiaries including Supermarket and Health & Beauty stores.

DFI Lucky Private Limited is the leading retail business in Cambodia which operates mostly 100 stores throughout the country and employs more than 1,300 team members.
Lucky operates Supermarkets and Express stores offering wide ranges of Fresh foods, Grocery and non-food items with many imported and exclusive brands that are only available at Lucky in Cambodia. Store coverage continues to expand through the city in Phnom Penh, and also in Siem Reap and Battambang.  

Guardian currently operates many locations throughout the city in Phnom Penh and in Siem Reap with wide ranges of Cosmetics, Beauty, Skin Care and health care products. Guardian also imports many products the Guardian brand which are exclusive to Guardian in South East Asia. Guardian continues to open stores in Cambodia and also operates small stores within Lucky Supermarkets or Express stores in selected locations.

Job Description: - Manage business and resources to achieve the direction and goal from management.- Conduct market, competitor, and customer analysis to identify business opportunities.- Prepare business plan, budget plan, reports to Director.- Accountable for budget achievement and performance of the team by ensuring the team's competencies and ability in performing their roles well through training, coaching and other relevant supports. - Lead Sales, Marketing and Application team in Planning and implementing the business strategy. - Ensure the team’s awareness of corporate direction, mission, objectives, and activities.- Provide sale forecast monthly, quarterly, annually, and as needed to management and vendors.- Attend trade meetings, and training.- Cultivate effective business relationships with external partners and internal partners.- Ensure customers’ satisfaction and compliance.- Manage the inventory stock to minimize the expired products. - Manage expenses and price to ensure on profitability, prepare calculation sheet before providing a quotation.- Develop job descriptions and responsibilities of sales, marketing and application team.- Perform other related tasks facilitate to director.
