MBA is preferable.* Selling, Negotiation, Marketing and Management skill* Good computer skill, presentation and reporting skill* Good in English (+Chinese is preferrable) 	Minimum 3 years in Business Management* Conflict management* Fostering collaboration* Communication and interpersonal awareness* Manage changes* Work management* Customer focus* Coaching & Development others* Decisiveness* Entrepreneur drive and Foresight* Influencing and impact* Striving for achievement* Critical thinking* Strategic focus* Willing to Improve* Flexible and independent* Professional and confident* Initiative, creative, ownership and responsible* Results oriented, well organized, and ethical manner

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
To report to Building Manager, this role’s responsibilities include:
• Ensure all owners, tenants, contractors and building users are provided with the information and guides required. 
• Regularly update owners / tenants regarding any on-going building work; to receive comments, suggestions or complaints. 
• To monitor and review the operation of all term service sub-contractors such as cleaning, security, pest control, landscape and lift contractors, as well as to ensure that those services are performed satisfactorily as agreed to in the contract and at the costs quoted. 
• To ensure the smooth daily operation of the building such as car park, vehicular and pedestrian access and security etc. 
• Follow up on any comments, suggestions or complaints until the matter is resolved. 
• Carry out regular building inspections and view from the client perspective. Report any issues or abnormalities to the Property Manager with a recommendation for improvement. 
• Perform other related tasks as assigned by the supervisor
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENTS:

1. Bachelor’s degree in any related field 
2. Male, minimum 21- years old   
3. Minimum 1 years’ work experience, property related work experience preferential 
4. Good appearance and personal presentation  
5. Service-orientated 
6. Good English communication both in verbal and written 
7. Good computer skill 
8. Able to work on weekends (Days off will be arranged during weekdays)

Salary: Negotiate

Location: Beungkok, Sangkat Sraschork, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh.

Working Hours
- Shift 1: 6am to 3pm
- Shift 2: 2:30pm to 10:30pm

Benefits:
- Leaves (AL, Sick Leave, Special Leave...)
- Public Holiday( Follow Cambodian Labor Law)
- Lunch Allowance
- NSSF
- Provide OT
- Seniority Pay
- Career development

Company Profile:
TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. (previously called TOTAL Cambodge) is an affiliate of TotalEnergies, a broad energy company that produces and markets energies on a global scale: oil and biofuels, natural gas and green gases, renewables and electricity. Our 105,000 employees are committed to energy that is ever more affordable, clean, reliable and accessible to as many people as possible. Active in more than 130 countries, TotalEnergies puts sustainable development in all its dimensions at the heart of its projects and operations to contribute to the well-being of people. 

TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been officially operating in Cambodia since 1993. Throughout the country, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been involved in marketing various energy and lubricants products and services to its customers in both the private and public sectors. We offer a wide range of products through more than 100 service stations with over 52 Bonjour Shops, Industrial fuels, Aviation fuels and lubricants. Through the TotalEnergies Card, customers are offered a convenient way to make and manage fuel purchases. Other services offered include used oil analysis, tank installations and bulk deliveries to many of our Commercial customers.

In view of supporting its growth in Cambodia, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.  is looking for a talented and motivated candidate for the position as follow:


Applications should be submitted via email: sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com *Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.

Company Profile:
With more than a dozen years of experience in hospitality, Madam Soklim opened her first restaurant, named Eleven One Kitchen after her lucky numbers. Offering both Khmer favorites as well as Western specials, her passion is to prepare delicious homemade food using local produce and without MSG.

Her first restaurant set in Toul Tompong area, features a spacious outdoor patio with luscious plants as well as an air-conditioned space. With the enormous success of the first restaurant, the owner opened a second in BKK1.  Set in a lush garden it feels like a small oasis in Phnom Penh’s concrete jungle. A fountain and abundant vegetation welcome the guests as they walk through to the cozy, yet spacious wooden terrace under natural bamboo shade.

Company Profile:
With more than a dozen years of experience in hospitality, Madam Soklim opened her first restaurant, named Eleven One Kitchen after her lucky numbers. Offering both Khmer favorites as well as Western specials, her passion is to prepare delicious homemade food using local produce and without MSG.

Her first restaurant set in Toul Tompong area, features a spacious outdoor patio with luscious plants as well as an air-conditioned space. With the enormous success of the first restaurant, the owner opened a second in BKK1.  Set in a lush garden it feels like a small oasis in Phnom Penh’s concrete jungle. A fountain and abundant vegetation welcome the guests as they walk through to the cozy, yet spacious wooden terrace under natural bamboo shade.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  098219333 hr.sakagro@outlook.com Eleven One Kitchen BKK1 Address: #20, Street 334 (between st.51 & st.57), Phnom Penh. 098219333

Job Description: As a Sales Representative, you will be responsible for promoting, selling, and branding the company’s products to all customers by making good relationships, building trust, and contacting customers for feedback to develop the company’s products. Identify target customers to sell products to meet the company’s target.  - Find out target customers to make an appointment and build good relationships to get trust - Adjusts content of sales presentations by studying the type of sales outlet or trade factor. - Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of dealers. - Submits orders by referring to price lists and product literature. - Keeps management informed by submitting activity and results reports, such as daily call reports, weekly work plans, and monthly and annual territory on pricing, products, new products, delivery schedules, merchandising techniques, etc. - Recommends product, service, and policy changes by evaluating results and competitive developments. - Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems, developing solutions, preparing reports, and making recommendations to management. - Maintaining professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing publications, establishing personal networks, and participating in professional societies. - Provides historical records by maintaining records on area and customer sales - Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed. - Responsible for other tasks as assigned by Supervisor/Management team.
Job Requirement: . Diploma Degree or higher in business, marketing, or related fields . Result-oriented and love to sell  . Fast and efficient worker, able to work under pressure, and highly responsible . Outstanding organizational and time management skills . Proactive problem solver . Willing to work hard and flexibility in working hours . Ability to multitask and prioritize daily workload . Understanding sales and marketing concepts, also knowledge of consumer behaviors . Good attitude and good interpersonal skills . Good command of spoken and written English and Thai ability will be highly considered . Good in Computer literacy (MS Office – Word, Excel, PowerPoint) ** If you are interested to be part of our team, please email your CV to hello@mpp-plastic.com or call 061 240 256 / 098 725 624- Website: https://mpp-plastic.com

Job Description: SUMMARY OF DUTY:  As a QC Operator, you are responsible for conducting quality checks for all the products from different production departments to match and meet the company's quality standards. You have to dedicate hard work during the work shift to ensure the best performance output. You have to update the work progress report to the management team and report any issue during the work shift to the shift supervisor. . Conduct Quality Check on-site for all the finished products before transporting the product to the storage area or warehouse . Check the QC report of the previous shift and continue to make accurate and detailed reports for the responsible shift, then pass the report to the next shift QC team to cross-check the report and continue onward  . Conduct spot checks on product quality from different production machines by weighing and checking each item's minute, product color, and size. etc. to ensure products are produced under the standard requirements  . Report to production supervisor/team leader when there is something wrong with the machine or products and keep checking until everything is back on track and normal  . Responsible for quality testing on products to make sure goods are meeting the expectation of the company and customers' standard requirements . Assist production team in clearing scrap and standby with the machine if the support is needed . Check the tidiness and quality of products packed before transport to the warehouse and customers . Other tasks assigned by the Operation Supervisor/Manage
Job Requirement: . High school certificate or relevant certifications  . At least 2 – 3 years of experience in QC experience from plastic manufacturing  . Commitment to work, honesty, and dedication to work hard . Good communication skills, positive working attitude, and good team player spirit . Fast learner with the ability to solve problems on the spot . Able to work flexible working shift hours and always be punctual and if plan to take leave, need to inform supervisor previously with good plans  ** If you are interested to be part of our team, please email your CV to hello@mpp-plastic.com or call 061 240 256 / 098 725 624- Website: https://mpp-plastic.com
